title: Diane
review: Spent 2 weeks here, it was very clean, beds comfortable and everything you needed for shelf catering. We booked sea view room but we're not happy with view as sea view was to side our direct view was of back of restaurants and car park. We asked for upgrade they only had 1 other which was on level 1 which balcony was level with restaurant roof and extra e20 a night I don't think so.. My advice when choosing room types go for pool view and you get it all. Safes here are at reception which I think is good Idea e36 for 2 weeks and you get e6 back. Pool bar excellent good food and good price usually these are expensive and not up to much but not here. The private beach is a SMALL PEBBLE BEACH main beach is about 15 minutes walk. Never a problem with sunbeds for the whole of the holiday although there were quite a lot of broken ones but we were there the last 2 weeks of season. Would I go again YES…

title: Liked this hotel
review: Thank you very much for your constructive criticism, we will consider all your comments and thanks to them we will try to improve our service because our goal is to achieve maximum customer satisfaction.

title: Horrible rude staff
review: Loved the position of this hotel.the rooms need updating. The communal area's are great.the rooms in our apartment were large except for the kitchen which is very basic with just 2 rings kettle and toaster no microwave. The bathroom was ok and had a hairdryer  and shower over the bath which was very powerful. Bedroom with 2 single beds together 2 bedside tables and built in mirrored wardrobe.safe boxes in reception for a fee.you need to book a seaview room as it was well worth the extra money.the balcony was large enough but could do with a bigger table to eat outside there is just a drinks table and chairs.the maid service was great when we were there and towels and bedding changed regularly in our 10 night stay.We loved it so much we have already booked for 2020.

title: Outside- nice, inside- not so much
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we see you again in 2020 !!!  :)

title: Good value and pleasant stay
review: We not long returned from this hotel as much as I love the town as been a million times never stayed at this hotel before and won’t again , yes the entrance is nice and pool is ok although having spent 40€ on lilos for the kids was not allowed them in the pool even though we was only ones round there rooms nice view that’s all but would of accepted all this if it wasn’t for the rude rude old man who walks round most night in a suit who got right in my 11 year old face and shouted be quite no noise to him as he was shouting his little sister name while she was in pram this was 7.30pm none of the staff was interested at all that hotel in the location it’s in could be the best in town with the right management and money spent on the rooms I’ll definitely be going back Santa ponsa but not that hotel…

Positive... comfy beds lovely view if u get a sea view Negatives... reception staff quite ignorant room needs a proper good clean wasn't even proper cleaned when we arrived. Know.its not the ritz but in 10 days the toilet not cleaned on the top once. Room 702. Had a very bad storm thunder lightening something crashed off our balcony went to reception early hours of morning they couldn't care less. Anyhow same night reported leak in the bathroom he came to look and said its normal so it's Normal for toilet roll to be wet everyday???  Pool bar shut  Indoor pool needs a dam good clean.. Never went in restraunt the smell of cabbage in the lift enough to put you off. Be careful with the hotel tax when u arrive ours was 40 euro for 2 adults for 10 nights. Safe is 30 euro I think you…

title: Lovely staff shabby rooms
review: We deeply lament reading that your stay at TRH Jardin del mar did not live up to your expectations, we would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements and offer to our guests a better ser

title: Shazza
review: Front of hotel very good. We were given ground floor apartment very dark hardly any sunlight coming in on balcony. Room needs updated paint flaking of walls. First few days bad sewer smell coming from toilet. Cleaning staff very good and plenty of fresh towels. Also laundry on site which is very good

title: lovly hotel
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardín del Mar since our goal is to offer a good service and that our clients feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust you have placed in us, we hope to see you again.

title: A wonderful short break - perfect.
review: Just returned from a self catering 5 night stay at this hotel and for the amount we paid were very happy overall. Yes, the rooms are dated and the cooking facilities minimal, but we didn't go on holiday to cook so didn't mind. We booked a sea view and it didn't disappoint. The view was fabulous even though we were only on the first floor. We had breakfast in the hotel a couple of times, and dinner one evening. The food was nice, but we preferred to eat out most times. Pool area is lovely and drinks very reasonable. Staff all very friendly and a nice walk in to town either along the road which is lined with shops and eateries, or along the seafront path which is very pretty. Would stay again if the price was right.

title: Birthday holidays
review: Just returned after a week here,rooms a bit dated but clean.good food staff very pleasant.would stay again ideal location would recommend sea view.plenty of shops near by.plenty of trips to do near by and beach 10min walk.

title: Lovely Holiday
review: Thank you very much for your assessment about our establishment! We hope to see you again in our hotel and that your experience will be pleasant again.

title: Spotlessly clean and very friendly
review: I’ve given a 5 star review despite a couple of issues because those issues were dealt with & there is nothing wrong with this hotel.  It’s a 3 star hotel, you can’t expect 5 star luxury, some of the reviews I read almost put me off what was a lovely stay. Yes, the hotel is reasonably dated but it’s also comfortable, very clean & really nicely situated just outside the main square & beach of Santa Ponsa.  The pool bar does nice food & the waiter was super friendly. The view from the rooms is stunning if you book a sea view room.  We had a superior sea view room (320) & had the biggest balcony with sun beds, it was amazing for the price we paid. There is a shop literally opposite, a couple of really nice resturants within 5 mins walk (see below) and the walk into ‘town’ & the…

title: Jardin del mar Santa Ponsa
review: Thank you very much for your assessment of our establishment and your fantastic review of the entire area surrounding the hotel !!!!! We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again very soon

title: TRH
review: Arrived 01/10/2019, fast check in.. room 117 sea view. Room although basic and looking a little tired being pine, was all comfy enough and very very clean ( I am a fusspot too!!)  Lovely view ( higher floor probably better) but we were happy enough.   We were half board and the food on offer for both breakfast and evening meals was plentiful and of a good quality. Staff in restaurant and bars were fantastic and efficient. Fab location also.  We would not hesitate to recommend this hotel & we would return.

title: Fabulous!
review: Lively and lovely hotel very clean and quite. Great variety and close to all santa ponsa. Shuttle and taxi service available aswell as tours. Lovely staff. Great pool area and outside bar. Wouldn't defo go there again! Ideal for families aswell as couples

title: Brilliant hotel
review: We are delighted with your words and the fact that your stay has been pleasant. We hope to see you again !!!!

title: Great value
review: We have just come back from a week in this hotel and we were very impressed.The hotel has everything you need for a holiday. Good ameneties,nice clean rooms,excellent breakfast,friendly staff.The only down side is no free Wi-Fi ( 2euros an hour) but the restaurant 20 yards away has free Wi-Fi so you can sit outside the hotel and use it.

title: Amazing view
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Short Break
review: Just spent 7 days here I found the staff very helpful. Hotel and garden spotless kitchen in room could do with a Refurb but went with no intention of using it had a new kettle,toaster and fridge so all good prices at the snack bar were reasonable drinks pricier than the town but usual in hotels. The location was excellent views spectacular we really enjoyed our stay and would go back nice hotel in a budget price range

title: Sun bed wars in high season!
review: We stayed August 15th to 24th. On arrival to the hotel at 12 noon we were quite sharply told that our room was not ready and would be around an hour. Not a big problem so we went across the road for some lunch. We returned an hour later to be told "still not ready, be another hour" returned at 2pm, still not ready. After 3pm before we eventually got our room so not a great start after being on the go traveling since 4am. Spoke to 5 different people around the pool who said they arrived only to be sent to another hotel for the first night due to overbooking so beware. Stayed in room 601, great sea view but very small, dated apartment, only 3 plug sockets in apartment and the most uncomfortable rock hard beds we have ever had. A small balcony overlooking the sea which was nice,…

title: Not the best
review: We are very sorry for the bad start of your holiday and for all inconvenience you have had. We will study your comments in order to improve our service. Thank you for your opinion, we will study your comments in order to improve our service

title: Receptionists
review: Pool area big and plenty of sun beds. Rooms in desperate need of renovation. No microwave or oven, just two hob rings. Staff pleasant enough.  Make sure you bring double adaptor as 3 plugs in the whole apartment!  Won't be returning.

title: Amazing location
review: Thank you for let us know the issues that you had during your stay in our hotel.  First we would like to apologize for the inconveniences. We are working on improve our services and your opinions are the most important to do it.

title: Family holiday
review: Thanks very much to the receptionist Maria for getting us a room higher up the building lovely room it was just what we wanted  Had a brilliant stay all the staff were helpful and friendly we will most  definitely be back again

title: Never be back!
review: Air Con was awful, two lifts for a big hotel, rooms dated and in need of an upgrade, beds uncomfortable, ants in the room and kitchen area, dining staff unfriendly, no entertainment or very poor, queueing for sunbeds then many being left all day with towels on, kitchen is very basic. Lifts were dirty with cups of juice left in them, kids playing in them, on arrival we were sent to another hotel - no rooms for us despite booking via travel republic some 5 months in advance......this was my third visit over the years and my LAST -  they have some lovely communal areas never being used, could be a really nice first class hotel if they spent some money on it. Only plus was the view if you ask for a sea view. My dad also came back from the week there and was hospitalised for three…

title: Great pool and bar/waiters but that’s about it
review: We deeply lament reading that your stay at TRH Jardin del mar did not live up to your expectations, we would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements and offer to our guests a better service.

title: Decent but not flawless
review: First proper holiday for me and my daughter.... Got to the hotel at around 1pm. When I booked, the check in said from 2pm however the sign at reception says 3pm. Was asked for my name and he took mine and my daughters passport etc I asked if they had a luggage room and he just handed me the key with no word to tell me where the luggage room was so I had to ask him and he just said ‘around the corner’ then said my room wasn’t ready and I should come back between 1.30-2pm. Me and my daughter went for lunch across the road which was amazing. Went back to the hotel at 2pm then got told by the receptionist my room still wasn’t ready. We had to then wait an extra 30mins. I had booked a sea view room so was surprised when he said we were on the 2nd floor. Went into the room and there…

title: Not worth the money you pay
review: Thank you very much for your constructive criticism, we will consider all your comments and thanks to them we will try to improve our service because our goal is to achieve maximum customer satisfaction. We are very sorry that on this occasion your stay was not as satisfactory as you expected, we hope to have the opportunity to surprise you positively on the next occasion.

title: Great family holiday
review: The room was a bit dated but clean, however the air-con wasn't great. TV in the room had a good choice of channels and radio. No microwave in self-catering room. Location is quite good and it was quiet during the night.  Wifi and safe should be included in the price.. Apart from that, we were happy with the stay.

title: Outdated
review: We spent as less time as we possibly could here as the condition of the apartment was extremely poor.  Standard room is very basic. The towels had holes and were stained, linen were also stained, remote control was covered in muck and walls were paper thin that you could hear your next door neighbour showering.  Maintenance required for broken window and balcony handles, ceiling paper was peeling, AC not working and broken sun beds to name a few.  Cleanliness is another issue. Also there were red ants in the bathroom.  Majorca was great unfortunatly this aparthotel is very outdated and needs major renovation.

title: Can not complain
review: We deeply lament reading that your stay at TRH Jardin del mar did not live up to your expectations, we would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements and offer to our guests a better service.

title: Not as bad as you think
review: We arrived after a long day of travelling. We were checked in and in bed ten minutes later. Yes rooms need a slight update but everything else was good. The staff were friendly never felt unsafe or our stuff was unsafe. Our room was cleaned most days and the cleaning staff, pool bar staff and reception staff were all so lovely. Only tried the food by the pool bar and it was lovely. The pool is annoying but it is what it is. It was still busy during our visit but always had sunbeds free and never any arguments over them. A wee cafe across the street called the lazy horse does nice food and the owners are so lovely and accommodating. Gorgeous view from the pool. Quick walk to the Beach and the square with nice food places. All in all can’t complain. Enjoyed ourselves.

title: Needs updating
review: Thank you very much for your review on Trip Advisor !!!!! We are delighted that your stay at our establishment has been satisfactory. We hope to see you again

title: Nice hotel.
review: As per other posters i was quite nervous going to this hotel, but in all honesty it was grand. We went as a family of 4 2 adults and 2 kids 8 & 6 check in was quick and easy - the rooms are small tired and old and could do with a makeover, very basic and plug sockets were a nightmare especially in the kitchen, kettle and toaster was used on the dining table, we gave the children the bedroom as we were up on the 5th floor so myself and my husband slept out in the living room - room was very tight when pullout bed was down it was so uncomfortable by the end of the week we didnt use it so i was on the couch and my husband was sleeping with the children, never had any issue with noise, as said before walls are paper thin, the pool was nice never had any issue getting sunbeds, pool…

title: pleasant but not fantastic.
review: Before I give my thoughts, I only booked this hotel around 3 weeks before we travelled and after reading the later reviews, it filled me with dread, some were pretty damning. However, I have always judged for myself so here goes:  Check In - We arrived late afternoon, the reception was quite modern and well decorated. We were checked in and ready to go within 10 minutes, great start.  Room - We walked into the room and immediately you realize the rooms are tiny for a family (2 adults + a 14 and 11 year old). The room was very dated which could be improved by painting the wood work and a splash of colour on the walls. Decent size bathroom with a shower etc. Kitchen has a fridge and 2 hob stove. Bedroom has fitted wardrobes with plenty of space for clothes. The double bed is…

title: Our check in ruined it for us unfortunately
review: Thank you very much for your constructive criticism, we will consider all your comments and thanks to them we will try to improve our service because our goal is to achieve maximum customer satisfaction.

title: Great choice, loved by the children.  Right next to the Mediterranean and lots of surrounding restaurants and bars.
review: Location: absolutely perfect in regards to the beach and the square (free nighttime entertainment outdoors). It took approx 10 mins to walk to the beach and less than 3 mins to get to the square. Close to plenty of shops, supermarkets and restaurants.   Pool area: fairly large, plenty of beds if used properly and not reserved and unused for hours, very clean, lovely cheap snack bar (and I really mean cheap). Only let down is that people are able to reserve beds from 8am until late afternoon and nobody does anything about it. Some beds are available up until 9am. After that, you have no chance until after 3pm. A very safe children’s play area under shade: typical cloning frame which is rather large. Perfect sea views right by the pool and you can walk down to the rocky cove and…

title: It's not the Ritz
review: Very friendly hotel, helpful staff,from the cleaners to the receptionist, to the door security.  Beautiful views over the bay. Great pool, with sunbeds and a few umbrellas. Rooms basic but clean.  Our room was a good size, with tv, separate bedroom for children, and small kitchen area.  We (adults) slept on the guest bed/sofa which was a little squeaky.  Low key entertainment each day, eg Water Polo game and childrens disco or a film on certain evenings.  Breakfast buffet was great (we were B & B). Close to many restaurants, bars and shops.  One minute away from a lovely, but small cove; very stoney, so beach shoes required. 10 minutes walk away from the main, sandy Santa Ponsa beach; very large, with sun beds to hire, water taps, with people swimming into the evening.  Table…

title: Overbooked: requires to stay mouldy room first night
review: Thank you very much for your review on Trip Advisor !!!!! We appreciate your comments about our staff, which help us to continue improving day by day. We hope to see you again

title: Great Hotel, excellent staff
review: Great location, few mins walk from the Square, and a Spar supermarket across the road which had everything we required. Rooms clean and we had a sea view which was lovely. We had breakfast a few mornings and had dinner two evenings and the food was excellent. The room was perfect for two of us as we were out most of the day but maybe two small for a family of four. The room was very clean with towels changed most days. The staff throughout the hotel were very pleasant and most helpful especially in reception who had great knowledge of Santa Ponsa.  Would return to this hotel when visiting there again.

title: Avoid please!!!!
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: 7 nights in August- Family of 4
review: Waited 2 hours to book in Room is old, dated, dirty, claustrophobic, would not feed my dog in kitchen, balcony faces wall n bush!!! Air con rubbish!!! I am sat in bed and can hear people in and outside 😩 Staff just not interested Can’t get a bed by pool😩literally crammed in  WiFi to pay Everyone is miserable and no atmosphere????  First holiday in a while, paid good money and asked for sea view!!! Gutted whilst all I can hear outside are pissed people lol!!! No sleep!! Get me fuking out of here!!!

title: In Need of Refurbishment
review: We deeply lament reading that your stay at TRH Jardin del mar did not live up to your expectations, we would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements and offer to our guests a better service.

title: Family of 4
review: Just come back from a week in the Jardin del mar, Santa Ponsa. Myself, hubby and two kids 9 and 4.   My first comment would be judge for yourself and to not to worry what others options are, you may be more well traveled than others or not as experienced! Here is my experience if you want to read on....   Arrived about 1.30pm, Room wasn’t ready but reception let us keep suitcases in a holding room and told us to use the facilities, no problem. We went to the pool got a drink for us and the kids and watch them play on the playground area (under shelter) which is ideal when it’s scorching!   We got our room about an hour later, we didn’t book a sea view, but got one with a side sea view anyway- bonus, yes rooms are basic but if you want a 5 star room,  pay for it! We didn’t have…

title: Jardin del sol
review: Very tired rooms. Self catering facilities very poor.Beds were torture.Everything is extra. Wifi is pay per device. Location is good as is the pool. We had a lovely view.I have stayed in Santa Ponsa before and imagined this hotel to be better than it turned out. Major investment needed.

title: Tired looking hotel/rooms needs some TLC, but still worth a stay
review: Thank you very much for your constructive criticism, we will consider all your comments and thanks to them we will try to improve our service because our goal is to achieve maximum customer satisfaction.

title: Gone downhill
review: Tired looking hotel but clean, reception staff helpful and happy to deal with customers, maids are cheerful some of the waiters/bar staff give you the feeling that they would rather be somewhere else and not dealing with you. Plenty to see using hotel as a base worth a visit to the beach area but there is a lovely cove just by the hotel. We stayed on a  B&B basis the breakfast was a good standard.

title: Read and decide you self
review: Thank you very much for your constructive criticism, we will consider all your comments and thanks to them we will try to improve our service because our goal is to achieve maximum customer satisfaction.

title: An average hotel at best...
review: Have visites 3 times in past 3 years. No longer worrh the cost of staying there even with perfect location beside the square.  Staff are friendly and pool is good. Rooms need serious updating and air con is some rooms bearly work. My fridge freezer didnt close as the freezer was over flowing with frost and didnt allow door to close. €20 extra per day for pool view. €40 extra for late check out and wifi is €20 per week and never have a decent signal.

title: Good Value
review: Just arrived back from a week here. Worth paying extra  for a sea view. WiFi you have to pay for but its not worth it as its not that good so we went to the bars across the way and used theirs for free . Staff are very friendly and helpful . Apartments are adequate a little tired could do with a bit of a makeover but they are kept spotless by the cleaners fresh towels 3 times a week and bed linen changed twice a week.   The 4th bed is a camp bed its a bit creaky and does take up a lot of space in the living dining area.TV has English channels . The food is good you can always find something you can eat the grandchildren loved the pancakes for breakfast . 4 bottles of water cost 8 euro with the meal at night .The waiters are lovely . It was quite rowdy this week as it was packed…

title: Perfect location
review: We have just spent a week B and B in this hotel. Myself, three teens and my parents. Whilst the rooms are very basic, the accommodation is spotless. It is very well located, across the bay from the main strip of clubs, pubs etc, but it is close to the square with children's mini, disco and lots of bars for adults later on. It is away from the road so, is very quiet for sleeping, although I did find the beds quite uncomfortable. The staff in the hotel are very freindly indeed, and our room attendant Loli was amazing. She works really hard and our room was kept clean and fresh regularly. Loli you are the happiest person I have ever met. Thankyou for helping make our stay a very pleasant one. You are an asset to the hotel and we will miss your smile, song, and general chatty…

title: Santa ponsa
review: Great trip, hotel was adequate. A few noisy youngsters but nothing too bad. Food was great always something for everyone. No evening entertainment but the square was only 100 yards so not a problem. Usual selfish people putting towels down and then disappearing all day. For a excellent meal go to the jaggy thistle.

title: Great value, lovely place, needs more parasols
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Holiday Review
review: Currently visiting for the 3rd time, normally come for a short anniversary break with the husband at the back end of September, when there’s always plenty of space, sun beds and shade for us as we’re of the paler (ginger and freckled) variety, rooms are basic but seen as they’re only to sleep, get showered and changed and maybe make breakfast and on an occasion if not eating out then to make dinner everything that is needed is there kettle, toaster, fridge & hob, they are always clean and made up efficiently, the free air conditioning isn’t the greatest but provides for a comfortable nights sleep once it finally kicks in. This year we decided to come with 2 of our kids (13 & 7) the pools clean and the room we have is spacious, clean and tidy although a little dated in comparison…

title: Would have been perfect but...
review: We visited here in July for a 3 night break for my husband's 40th birthday 2 adults and 2 children (10 & 13)  The Location is perfect and Santa Ponsa is beautiful, plenty of bars and restraunts on your doorstep. There is a quiet cove which has a pebble beach nearby it is ideal for snorkelling and the main beach around 10 minute walk.  The hotel would have been great however there was an issue with our air conditioning which was reported on our first morning. The staff at reception assured us they would get someone out to look at it, however this was never resolved and we spent our 3 nights melting in our room it was difficult to sleep. We had to go out and buy a fan it was that hot inside. The rooms are very very small especially with a small camp bed set up alongside your…

title: Last Minute Get What You Pay For
review: Thank you very much for your time and the trust you have placed in us, we will consider your comments to continue improving our services.

title: First stay at Jardin Del Mar
review: Just returned after a week 2 adults 2 kids 9 & 12. Hotel was definitely full of families & kids & not over run by young ones...1 or 2 groups who usually appeared late afternoon but were no bother! Hotel is in a good location right next to the square for nightly entertainment & there is a spar on the doorstep.  We booked last minute & weren't expecting much knew it would be basic. It was clean & kitchen had the essentials though cooker was hard to work as it's that old all writing has worn away. The kitchen area is tiny with only 1 socket which is to high up for toaster cable to reach...we had to make toast in toilet as making it in living area set off silent smoke alarm sending security to our door!! Living area is also very small especially if u need the extra bed you will need…

title: Wouldn’t visit again
review: Thank you very much for your constructive criticism, we will take into account all your comments and thanks to them we will try to improve our service because our objective is to achieve the maximum satisfaction of our customers.

title: Great hotel. Sea view room lovely
review: Location was very important for us so this hotel was perfect. Right outside the square and not far from the beach. Right out the back there is a beautiful cove which is perfect for snorkelling. The hotel itself is clean, staff friendly and the rooms have almost everything you need but no microwave which really should be addressed. The only downside I can think of (this didn't bother us) is that the hotel does accept groups of young males and females and they can get a bit excited. Walls are also very thin. I was in the bathroom and could hear the family next door having a conversation very clearly. Would I stay here again ? Yes.

title: Bring earplugs, just in case!
review: Slamming doors, paper-thin walls, hard beds, slightly tired decor, the odd cracked tile here and there...welcome to a Spanish hotel!   That said, we paid a little extra and had a 'superior room' (separate bedroom) with the most stunning view South across the bay, and a huge corner balcony. And all of the faults listed above. (If you don't specify sea view when you book your view may be of a wall on the other side of the hotel). Our room was kept really clean, beds and towels changed regularly. The t.v. showed a limited number of U.K. channels, and there's a safe if you want to pay for a key. The fridge cooled stuff down, the cooker heated stuff up but, alas, no microwave. Aircon (no extra charge) worked ok and was quiet enough to use all night. Wi-fi (extra cost) was distinctly…

title: Dissappointing lanuage from young adults and behaviour.
review: Thank you very much for your time and the trust you have placed in us, we will consider your comments to continue improving our services. We hope to see you again.

title: Not a family hotel
review: This was our first visit to this hotel and it will be the last. When booking with Jet2 it states ideal for families and couples. I am al for people having fun at the right time and not late at night or early in the morning, we found that the hotel allows large groups of single sex groups. Not all  groups were vulgar with their language, We found a group of Irish boys and girls were the worst. I don't think its acceptable to say the Fword and C word around the bar and pool and take over the pool area with their own loud music. Which there are rules saying not to play own music. We had 3 different music coming from all directions, The life guard or other staff are not bothered. We had a group of Irish girls early in the morning after they got back from the clubs screaming up the…

title: Sans Ponsa
review: We deeply lament reading that your stay at TRH Jardin del mar did not live up to your expectations, we would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements and offer to our guests a better service.

title: Lovely hotel but needs a few tweaks
review: Myself, wife and daughter stayed here for 7 nights. Although we arrived after midday we were told our room wouldn't be ready until after 3pm. The hotel was overrun by groups of males and females in their early 20's. The language by the pool was disgraceful there was several groups drunk from midday and very intimidating, they over took the pool so it was impossible for families to use. The hotel security did approach the groups but didn't follow it up when the groups continued with their unacceptable behaviour. The hotel was very noisy in the early hours when they returned from the clubs. When we went to the pool in the morning they were asleep on the loungers by the pool. Hotel reception staff were very polite but pool bar staff/life guards very ignorant and unhelpful they were…

title: Fab hotel but noisy
review: We just returned from a week stay here. Had stayed here a few years previously. Lovely hotel it’s spotlessly clean. The maids do a fantastic job at the upkeep. Pool area is fab we were able to get beds at 12pm in the afternoon I don’t knw any other hotels that you could do this!  Apartments are very clean but could do with modernisation. You have to pay fir WiFi which is €20 for the 1st device and €10 for each additional ones a bit steep considering this is free in most hotels. Safe was €15 fir the week with a €6 deposit on top which is returned once the keys are handed back.  Very near the square which is fab for the kids. The downsides were we had a lot of younger people staying in the hotel which didn’t cause any bother until the last 2 days there was party’s screaming…

title: Lovely stay
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Basic to say the least
review: Stayed here in June 2019 had a lovely stay.  Highlights, the pool area, the views are amazing the pool bar lovely staff are very pleasant and friendly.  Even better if’s, the rooms are adequate and clean however they are ‘tired’ the kitchenette had no workable plug points we had to plug the kettle in on the floor in the living area which is not ideal but we had no children in our party so no issues really. The plug socket in kitchen meant the wire was across the kitchen.   The staff at reception were helpful and friendly the hotel itself was on the edge of the resort but it’s only 10 min walk to the main strip and nightlife. No night time noise so a good nights sleep was had every night!   The only negative, we had room 415 and the balcony railing needs fixing for obvious…

title: Really good hotel but thin walls.
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Nice holiday
review: Stayed here for 4 nights .rooms are basic,the air conditioner made such a racket we had difficulty sleeping even though I reported it twice to reception. We ate in the restaurant one night and were very disappointed with both the quality, choice and the restaurant manager who was very rude , not even a drink of water without charge . The WiFi that was advertised had to be paid for . Only good thing was the pool which was very nice and plenty of sun beds.

title: Good location nice stay
review: We stayed at this hotel for a week in June we stayed half board but didn’t eat at the hotel as there is a lot of nice restaurants close by. We did eat at the snack bar through the day and the food was nice and reasonably priced. When we arrived we asked if we could upgrade to a sea view but the hotel was fully booked however we could still see the sea from our room. The hotel is in a fab location all public areas of the hotel were nice, the pool area and snack bar was nice although difficult to get loungers. The rooms could do with a refurb as they are very dated but still clean. Rooms were cleaned every day and regular clean towels. The only problem we had was the beds are very uncomfortable. The hotel did seem very child friendly although we travelled as a couple I am pregnant…

title: You get what you pay for
review: All in all okay for the low price paid. Food was acceptable but nothing special. Had a sea veiw with balcony lovely veiws but apartment a little run down and dated. Towels provided in apartment.  Entertainment was lacking. Staff  friendly and polite.  Shame the hotel let people block sunbeds from early in the morning and go out on trips returnimg in afternoon as someone else could of made use of it. Maybe a no return within an hr towel removed policy could be applied.

title: Nice hotel with stunning views, perfect for price
review: We stayed here for 5 nights and really could not complain, we did not want to spend a lot of money on a hotel but we wanted it to be clean and this hotel was exactly that. It was clean, fresh towels when needed, stunning views out to the sea, and in a nice location, has a little path down past pool a long the sea front, all the staff very very friendly. Its not far down to the main strip, arrived late on the check in was super fast. If you are looking for 5star, pay for it, this is excellent for the price.

title: Wifi awful & not secure
review: Thank you very much for your constructive criticism, we will take into account all your comments and, thanks to them, we will try to improve our service because our goal is to obtain maximum satisfaction from our customers. We regret that this time your stay has not been as satisfactory as expected, we hope to have the opportunity to surprise you positively on a future occasion.

title: Nice Hotel
review: I booked this last minute just wanting to get away from the rain and had low expectations for the price we paid. However I was pleasantly surprised.  There has obviously been some money spent in recent years but they have clearly spent it on the public areas such as the pool which is a good idea as it was exceptionally clean and well maintained. There was the usual reserving of sun beds from fairly early morning, despite a sign banning it but seemed to always be somewhere to sit. The rooms whilst very dated were clean and functional and nothing to complain about (our daily cleaner Loli was fabulous).  The hotel is in a great location about a 10 minute walk from the hell that is the main strip of Santa Ponsa (just awful), with a couple of really good supermarkets and some…

title: Stunning location !! noisy at night!!
review: Ive just returned from a 7day holiday with my 2 children.  They cried they didn’t want to leave!! Nadia fab with the kids! Mini disco, kids activities, fab pool- the lifeguard with short hair and a quiff seemed uninterested in his job! Clean hotel and room ++++ .  Stayed half board- great choice kids loved it.  Beautiful stunning views recommend sea view!!!  The only thing that let this place down was my lack of sleep from the uncomfortable sofa bed and noisy party goers coming and going shouting till 6!! The walls are thin so you can hear it all. Woken up 3 nights by someone woman screaming and then crying .  I know it’s hard for the hotel to manage behaviour and it’s a pity it’s attracting this type of behaviour so maybe some signage up? On leaving this morn at 7am the poor…

title: Party Hotel
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Terrymac
review: Good points  Clean hotel with very friendly and helpful staff and reasonable facilities.  Bad points   The walls in the apartments are paper thin and in Santa Ponsa (particularly at the weekend) this is not a good thing if you are looking for a relaxed time away or indeed just want more than 4 hours sleep a night. I have stayed in the party central of magaluf and this place was louder!!alot louder. Not to Labour on this point but the noise is a combination of the street parties outside and the countless party revellers shouting inside the hotel and running up and down hallways until 4am.   Moving on.. Wi-Fi costs 5 euro per day and you pay a daily fee for a safe. Thought that was a bit steep!  I don't want to sound overly critical of the place and I love a party myself, however…

title: Can’t expect much at this price and that is what we got
review: Thank you very much for your constructive criticism, we will take into account all your comments and thanks to them we will try to improve our service because our objective is to achieve the maximum satisfaction of our customers.

title: Very good holiday...
review: If you like a hotel by the sea in a good location for all amenities then this could be for you. The hotel caters for families and is child friendly. Good accommodation with clean rooms and a utility kitchen. Very good restaurants nearby  and entertainment is provided in the Square a short walk from the hotel.  All in all a good choice hotel for a sunny holiday and a short break. This is my 4th year I've stayed here in June and i have no complaints.

title: Family wedding
review: We have just come back from a 7 day visit from Santa ponsa we stayed at TRH JARDIN DEL MAR hotel could do with a bit of a lift ie rooms but if your not to fussed on comfort or luxury then this a good hotel . However quite a few young people did stay at this hotel and can be quite noisey at times . Weather was ok for this time of year not to hot only had 1 bad day of weather. Also not a very lively resort great for family’s with young children

title: Room with a view
review: No complaints about this hotel. Definitely worth paying extra for sea view. Rooms basic but clean. Nice pool with friendly bar service. Strongbow cider at decent price and slushes too. Will defo return

title: Amazing location.
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Worst start to a holiday ever .
review: Whilst I read the reviews and was slightly wary I should have realised that people moan about everything. We arrived at 11pm and the room was dated agreed however very clean, spacious and the view from the balcony was amazing over the pool. When waking next day and pulling back the curtain.. what can I say wow... we paid 380 pound for the two of us to stay for a week. The hotel is friendly clean and in a prime location for exquisite restaurants and bars on either the sea edge or in the local town. Little coves span the walk to the town. Once again Santa Ponsa is amazing please do not listen to the reviews I am fussy but this was amazing. Thank you

title: Nice week in the sun
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Great Value for Money!
review: My son (11yrs) and I had a lovely 10 day stay over Easter.  The only thing that let us down a bit was the weather but we had lots of rest!  The hotel was comfy and the staff were very friendly and professional. I could not fault this for the price at at all.  There was no fully inclusive and food/eating out can be quite expensive which really bumped up the cost of the holiday!  The hotel offers a great value for breakfast and dinner.     There is a cafe/bar by the pool during the day.  We were self catering, the location is great as it is not in all the madness.  There are few little supermarkets that sell gorgeous fresh bread, coffee sachets, milk and cereal.  There is a Burger King/MacDonald's in the main part for the odd lunch/dinner time.  I would not recommend eating out at…

title: Excellent location.
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Don’t bothee
review: The hotel is situated a nice distance away from the noisy strip in Santa Ponsa, and only a small walk away from the sea where there are stunning views. Short and beautiful walk to the main beach. Room is basic and could do with a few bits and pieces done. Chipped tiles and furnishing etc. But overall pretty good. The breakfast was lovely. I'd recommend staying here if you're not that bothered about having a basic room and care more about location. Other info: you must pay for a safe if you wish to use one.

title: Fantastic ever time
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Short Break
review: Booked a late deal for me and my son. After falling in love with the area.  Unfortunately the hotel is disappointing. We booked sea view but when we got here we had to pay €40 extra for the view.  Booked half bored, breakfast ok, coffee machine available for coffee but on an evening you have to pay for this as they turn the coffee machines off. I think this is cheeky! Staff at breakfast and dinner are lovely. But we only ate at the restaurant once as so many nicer places to eat in town.  Reception staff are very rude and sarcastic.  Outside pool area clean but indoor pool area is disgusting. Cigarette ash everywhere and just plain grubby. Rooms so dated, double bed is two singles on wheels which is annoying as my little boy fell in between and hurt his head.  Towels are changed…

title: AMAZING EVERY YEAR I GO
review: Hi. Can I say this is one of the best hotels I've been too with my family. The most welcoming and friends staff. Simple clean rooms with a amazing sea view. People who complain about that I would suggest you write what view you want specifically. Also, the range of food in the evening and mornings is amazing. Lovely staff, we go every year so the staff love it when we come :) never regret coming here!! And my kids love it... :)

title: Nice hotel but shame about the neighbours
review: Thank you very much for your kindness and your words to our staff !!!!! See you next year :)

title: Left disappointed!!!
review: Stayed with my husband and 17 month old. Nice hotel. Good location and friendly staff. Disappointed ended up with a room facing a wall despite the hotel being no where near sold out. First 4 nights were great. Corridor was quiet but on our last night 4 or 5 rooms at either side of us had a group of boys on a stag do. Extremely loud and foul language. Music blasting at all hours during the night keeping us awake and my baby having a disturbed sleep. Don't understand why the hotel would put a group like that right beside a family with a young baby when there was plenty of empty rooms. Ruined the end of the trip for us. Heard of others getting free upgrades to sea views or half board. This wasn't offered to us.

title: SCAMMING PEOPLE BUT NOT VERY CLEVER IN DOING SO!!!
review: Thank you very much for your review. We regret that your stay has been disturbed by noise and other guests.

title: Hen weekend
review: Good location and close to several bars and restaurants. Not particularly busy at this time of year but a decent number of people around. Entertainment stopped by 10.30pm and the staff were variable. Considering there are no microwaves in rooms we asked reception if they could sterilise some baby equipment for us and they advised it would not be a problem. Went last night and it was done without a problem, different staff and story tonight. Also although advertised as family friendly there are no (well at least easily identifiable) baby changing facilities. Overall a bit disappointed with some staff excelling and others found wanting.

title: Loved it
review: We’ve just returned from a 5 night stay 5/4/2019-10/4/2019  Checkin was quick , all parts of the hotel was immaculately clean , we stayed in room 115 which overlooked the pool and the sea we had 2 single beds and a sofa bed , yes rooms are a little dated but perfectly liveable . Breakfast was typical buffet style so always something for everyone, snack bar has a great menu and reasonably priced. Animation team are great with the kids. Location is brilliant there are restaurants , shop’s and bars right outside the hotel and Santa sonsa square is just 2 minutes away , though the square had no entertainment on when we were there as it’s out of season. We would definitely return to this hotel. The small downside to our holiday ( which is nothing to do with the hotel) was the…

title: My stay
review: Thank you very much for your review on Trip Advisor !!!! We are delighted that your stay has been pleasant. We hope to see you again

title: Lovely stay at a brilliant hotel
review: Dissapointed  to say the least  took 2 hours to get the room apparently  they werenot ready but we werenot the only ones who had to book  one person on reception  when the queue  nearing  the entrance  door /, booked with jet 2 very dissatisfied  with them this time I don't  know how they gave 3 star  , rooms very outdated  paid extra for sea views got a room with big palm tree   , in front of the balcony   I will give 1star and that aswell for the food it was edible    DISSAPOINTED  TRAVELLER

title: SANTA PONSA
review: We deeply lament reading that your stay at TRH Jardin del mar did not live up to your expectations, we would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements and offer to our guests a better service.

title: Short stay - just ok.....
review: My partner and I had originally booked to stay at the Palmanova Suites by TRH in Magaluf, however we were disappointed to hear that the hotel had not yet opened following refurbishment.   We we're informed several hours prior to travel that our reservation had been moved to the Jardin del Mar in neighbouring Santa Ponsa.   We arrived in the very early hours due to a 3 hour delay caused by Ryanair and finally arrived at the hotel at 5am. We were extremely tired and were thrilled to receive such a warm welcome at the hotel.  Upon arrival we were informed that we had been upgraded to half board catering from B&B due to the 'trouble' caused by us having to move hotels. We were again thrilled!  The rooms are a little dated, but this really isn't an issue when you have a balcony that…

title: Weekend break
review: We stayed here from 29 March TIL 1 April. Self catering but upgrade to breakfast. Room had plenty of sleeping facilities and bathroom kitchenette and lounge. Would stay here again. As out of season not much going on but it was a relaxing few days. Staff at reception very helpful and speak good English. Scenery gorgeous would recommend

title: Value for money - Stunning views
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: We return again
review: Good value for money, clean, comfortable and a great location. Pay extra for the sea view rooms, you won't be disappointed. Situated just a few minutes walk to the nearest shops and the famous Sqaure. 10 minutes walk to beach and main resort which is on a slight incline but in no way unmanageable. Best Breakfast is definitely at The Tuck Inn, this is on the left hand side as you walk into the main resort! Would return to this hotel just based on the views, as pictured! :)

title: Spotlessly clean
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Needs updating
review: We have stayed at the Jardin on many occasions,it is comfortable, clean and in a good location.Sadly now it is looking a bit dated,wooden furniture could do with some TLC.or a complete upgrade.We will give it another chance.

title: Nice Hotel
review: The hotel is situated in our favourite part of Santa Ponsa(quieter) and is very well kept.The reception staff are very efficient,helpful and pleasant, in fact all  staff were. Cannot comment on the food as we were room only but the restaurant looked nice.Would go again .Regards Vince 402

title: Girlie few days
review: Thank you very much for your constructive criticism, we will consider all your comments and, thanks to them, we will try to improve our service because our goal is to obtain maximum satisfaction from our customers.

title: Great place for families and couples
review: Great place for unwinding.. lovely little cove for swimming.. great places to eat.. awesome breakfast at Ackroyds over the road... and the auld triangle for fab Irish music .. although apartment only we did  have a day of halfboard which was more than adequate.. 14€ for breakfast and dinner (both all you want buffet style)  will defo return

title: Fab holiday
review: Thank you very much for your constructive criticism, we will consider all your comments and, thanks to them, we will try to improve our service because our goal is to obtain maximum satisfaction from our customers.

title: Holiday 😁
review: I have just returned from a week at the trh. I read the reviews prior to going and always have an open mind. The hotel is large and situated at the end of town but everything is within walking distance. The hotel is spotless, staff really helpful and lovely pool area with great views over a little cove. You can walk along the coast to get into town or through the town itself. Although basic the hotel is perfect for the money. Just across the road are restaurants and supermarkets. I would definitely return as the kids loved it. It's also safe and lone travellers would find it perfect.

title: Lovely hotel
review: This was a lovely clean hotel, with friendly staff willing to helpThe food was delicious ranging from traditional and continental the breakfast was delicious with an excellent range. The views were beautiful overlooking the sea with a gorgeous sunrise on a morning. The pool was lovely and there were plenty sun loungers. We had a fab holiday in the Jardin de Mar

title: carnt fault it
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Good family holiday
review: arrived back two days ago already looking at same hotel for next year- but needs microwave in kitchen and more plugs in apartment - but survived by cooking toast in the bedroom and boiling kettle on the dressing table . the views are to die for - book front face sea view room - loads of places to eat - Chinese  7 50 euros  beer  2 euros - 20 mins walk to town - some lovley bars along the way - try the club sandwitch at the hotel -  will be back  x

title: The best views!
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Decent Hotel. A real lack of amenities
review: We are just back from a week at Jardin del Mar and were mostly really happy with our stay. On arrival the reception staff were really friendly and helpful, we paid the tourist tax and paid for a safety deposit box (21 euro for week, 6 Euro back when hand key back) and then went straight to our room, the room was rather disappointing, it was quite dated and in need of a refurb but it was spotless and the bathroom was really modern and looked like it had been refurbed in recent years. My only main issue with the room was we were on the ground floor at the side of the hotel which looked out to trees, we got no sun light or day light into our room or balcony at all at any time of the day which i wasn’t happy about.  The maids were in everyday except a Thursday and Sunday, they done…

title: Dont Judge a Book by its Cover
review: Dont know where to start. we have been to this resort on numerous occasions and passed by this hotel often, so we decided to book a week there to sample. on the facade it looks inviting but once you delve deeper it hold unwelcome surprises. On checking in we were told our room wouldn't be ready for a few hours, this wasn't a problem as we have experienced this before. On our return from a walk to pass the time we were ready to be checked in, receptionist needs training on customer relations, couldn't believe her attitude. We paid for the letter box safety deposit box ( which is situated at reception ) and situated next to a public phone ( yes they still exist ). So, paid for the box and hotel tourist tax and then I asked how much to hire 2 towels for the pool area, the…

title: Another good stay
review: This is about the 20th time we have stayed in this hotel and we still love staying here. Yes there are a few issues, like this time the bathroom was not cleaned as well as it could be but that is a small issue that you can overlook and the cooking facilities are not very modern, but who wants to cook on holiday.!! We take a mini electric kettle with us to save having to wait for a cuppa in the morning. The staff are much improved from previous years and will do their best to help wherever they can, fir example we had an ssue with our room door handle but having reported it to reception it was sorted out within minutes. The hotel could do with some updating in the rooms BUT  you just cannot beat the view from the sea view rooms, that alone is worth the money, also the pool is a…

title: You get what you pay for
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Very nice place to stay.
review: We stayed at this hotel for a week in September. The room was very dated but after all we did just want a cheapish week away. There was plenty of space in the room, the bathroom was clean and the shower was powerful. The kitchen was tiny but we don't cook on holiday so that wasn't a problem for us. The air con may as well not be there because you could barely notice that it was on. We didn't pay extra for a sea view so our room was looking out onto a car park, so if you want a nice view you'd definitely have to pay yhe extra for it. The balconies have no privacy either.  The pool area is great! There were plenty of beds and great views. The snack bar is perfect for lunch time with reasonable prices. The small beach near the hotel is also really nice but it is rocky so I'd…

title: Really nice break at a great 3* hotel
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: My holiday at Jardin del mar
review: What a lovely hotel would recommend strongly,lovely rooms very clean,lovely food,wonderful views from balcony,very pleasant staff very polite and helpful,currently staying here 17/09/18 and will be very sad to leave and will definetly be coming back thankyou hotel Jardin del mar for a wonderful holiday,Julie bayliff xx

title: Did not feel safe!
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Fire
review: The only good thing about this hotel is it’s location!!! The rooms are dated and uncomfortable! And you can barely get in the rooms the doors are so crap! The room above our room set on fire and our room flooded!!! No alarms went off and the hotel refused to give us a new room as they were ‘fully booked’

title: Can't moan
review: Stayed at the jardin del mar from the 4th of sept for 10 nights what a disaster when we arrived they had no room for us the there was a fire we were woken by one of the people on the same corridor we had to go down the the fire exit which was badly lit when we go to the bottom it was pitch black couldn't see a thing water coming in I I was on out in my pyjamas I was soaked it was so frightened no alarms went of this place is a death trap

title: Nice hotel
review: I really can't understand why all the negative reviews, especially about the rooms...you pay for 3 star not 5! The only negative I have is the cleaning and changing of towels not being done on a daily basis . The rooms have a magnificent view,that alone Was worth going for, the pool area was clean with spare beds at all times although sun worshippers did hog certain ones. Food was great and always something you liked, we was even given a packed lunch to go home with as our pick up was at 7. There a market at a place called Andratx which you can catch number 102 bus on a Wednesday, we went but it was quite a poor market and not in an area for sightseeing, I would advise not to go. All in al I would highly recommend this hotel for spacious rooms the food and location.

title: Quirky hotel
review: Clean well managed hotel with very good staff but has some out of date practices.  No cards to open room doors here or turn on your electricity you use keys.  These days WIFI should be free and available in this hotel you Have to pay. Why do this when restraunts near by give free WIFI.  This hotel has a very deep pool up to 2.5 meters in places so make sure u can swim.  Positives include the pool bar which has excellent food and the reception area where the staff are helpful and pleasant.  Rooms are clean and have all necessary items

title: Stay Away
review: Thank you for taking your time to write a comment on Tripadvisor We would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements for the near future.

title: Ok but did not feel safe
review: Stayed here on 5th Sept till the 12th and would never stay here again. On arrival (4pm) our room was not ready and we were giving another room for the night which was terrible you wouldn't put a dog in it.  The next day we were giving our room which they told us that was upgraded to a superior room, well if that was a superior room i wouldn't like to see a standard room. The apartment was tiny, broken furniture and no privacy. The balcony was huge but was divided by glass which was on a corridor so everyone could see you sitting out and see into your apartment. The worst part about the hotel was the fact that there was a fire in the 2nd floor and we were on the 5th and no one came and knocked on our door or any fire alarms went off we had to be told about the fire from a couple…

title: Honest review of the jardin del mar
review: We deeply lament reading that your stay at TRH Jardin del mar did not live up to your expectations, we would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements and offer to our guests a better service.

title: Disaster
review: We stayed at the Jardin Del Mar for five nights last week as a family of four (all adults). Upon arrival we found the reception area was lovely and clean and the staff were friendly, we were told we would have the penthouse suite instead of two separate rooms. We did not mind too much as it was massive with 3 balconies, however there is only access via stairs after the 7th floor which luckily for us, was not an issue (but a struggle to carry four big cases up). The room itself was terribly dated, which I did not mind on first impression. One of the bedrooms did not have a door which meant there was little privacy for some of the family.(especially when we booked 2 separate apartments) We found most of the furniture was falling to pieces or broke. There was a huge crack in the…

title: Brilliant
review: Seriously what are the negative reviews,we stayed here the last week in August and i can honestly say this was a great place to stay.There is a cove about 1 minute away that is beautiful for just chilling out,the hotel??what do you want at 3 star prices the pool area is great the rooms do the job,people moan about the air con but its on all day even when you take the key out for the electricity,close the balcony door and it will be sweet.The restaurant food is ok your in Spain your not going to get everything tasting like the local chippy down the road from where you live.The square is about a 2 minute walk away so thats probably why there is no entertainment(except for mini disco)at the hotel.The main Santa Ponsa beach is about a 8-10 minute walk away but follow the coastline…

title: Superior & S/C review
review: Dear Jean,  We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us. We hope to see you again.

title: Wont be rushing back
review: My review for this hotel is based on a family, self catering stay in an upgraded Superior room.  Hotel - Hotel is at the top of a hill about 15 minutes from the beach. The popular Square is about 2 minutes away. Nice local bars right outside the entrance. Very nice pebble cove at the back of the hotel. Lots of restaurants in the streets around. ATMs and shops right outside. All rooms barring one side have fantastic views (Pic). As some reviews state it could do with updating. It is very nice but seems a little 80s/90s, which isn't a bad thing to be fair. Hotel is very clean and well maintained. Staff were polite and helpful.  Room - We upgraded to a superior due to other reviews regarding standard rooms, this cost €20 per day (I did read differing prices at €15?). The room…

title: Pros and Cons – Good Hotel with Minimum Expectations
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us , we are working on improve our services and your opinions are the most important to do it.  Best regards

title: THR Jardin Del Mar
review: Not long back from a stay at the Jardin Del Mar. Let me start with the good points.....amazing view from our sea view room & the room and hotel was spotlessly clean and the hotel is in a great location.  Now onto the not so good parts...on arrival there was a queue to check in.  The receptionist did not look up or acknowledge anyone for a good 5 minutes until popping her head up and saying.....yes? Anyway check in took about 40 minutes, the receptionist could have atleast smiled, we were told our room would not be ready until 3pm (we arrived at 11am) but we could leave our luggage and head to the pool. Ha! Not one bed available by the pool it was mayhem. Several nights from my balcony i seen towels down at midnight.  Only ate once at the pool bar (when we were waiting for our…

title: Great holiday
review: Just returned from 7 days self catering at the jardin del mar, and cannot fault the hotel or facilities. Great outdoor pool area and close to all local bars,restaurants etc. My 8 and 12 year old kids especially loved the view from the balcony across the bay. I would recommend a front sea view on floor five if possible. The supermarket over the road from the hotel stocked everything we needed, some great local wines at reasonable prices. All in all a great holiday. Maybe the hotel could spend some money on some more gym equipment ie weights or upgrade the machines ( I know it's not high on people's list of priorities whilst on holiday). I wouldn't hesitate to return to this hotel.

title: Ignore the moaners
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Beautiful spot
review: Never leave reveiws but felt i had to after reading some on here... After reading all the reveiws of this hotel i was dreading it reading people being robbed /rooms no good /no beds by pool you name it i was expecting the worst. This is my 4th time in santa ponsa so i know were everything already is the location is perfect. the hotel is great for what you pay. Rooms clean and maid in every day. They are basic but clean. Never any problems getting a bed no matter what time of the day one down side is the pool is all one length so kids under 11 cannot stand up only in the baby pool they can stand up. Would stay at this hotel again

title: Basil works here
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again!!!!!!!

title: Ups and downs
review: Location is everything here.  It was our 4th time and we love it. Hotel is always clean, staff very friendly and views are stunning.  Food was ok but not very varied, would probably just do B&B next time as we found it very reasonable to eat out.  As a single mum I felt very safe both in the hotel and around the lovely resort.  We didn't hang around for the entertainment as the square opp always has things going on.  Only problem we found was the dreaded sunbed wars.  We never got any as they were all reserved with towells by 8am. Unfair esp as most arn't in use til the afternoon.  Like most hotels this sunbed selfishness needs stamping out.  Thoroughly recommend tho 👍

title: Stag Party
review: Absolutely fantastic stay, rooms are bit basic but its all you need,staff are friendly and helpful, great little restraunts directly across from it,which was handy,as well as a super market! its about a 10min walk into the clubs,which we didnt mind at all,so we had no outside noise at night! views from the pool area are incredible! few negative reviews on here,but with without a doubt i would stay here again

title: In a nutshell - an honest review.
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardín del Mar since our goal is to offer a good service and that our clients feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust you have placed in us, we hope to see you again.

title: Good base, nothing to write home about
review: Just got back from a weeks stay at the TRH Jardin. The hotel itself is set in a fantastic location. Near to bars, restaurants and 'the square' where there is nightly entertainment, suitable for families. You are only a short walk from the beautiful beach and more bars and restaurants.  The rooms at the hotel are very poor. For a family of 2 adults and 2 children, the sleeping arrangements consisted of one double bed - with the most awful mattress, a sofa to sleep on (which was probably the most comfortable) and a camp bed which you could feel every single spring! The air conditioning was just non existent. So combining awful beds + poor air con (given that the temperature exceeded 35 degrees some days) = grumpy adults & children. The food at the hotel was poor. Very limited. The…

title: Nice hotel
review: An average hotel, have stayed in better. Nicely situated, not far form the main beach and a few minutes walk away from the main square where you will find pubs, shops and restaurants, and free entertainment. Apartments are very basic, quite roomy for a couple but cramped for a family. Walls are very thin, could hear next doors conversation and television, not good when they get in at 1/2 am!!!!  On the third night we were woken up at 3am by 3 apartments on the 4th floor having conversations,and shouting. We couldn't stand this any longer,so the next morning we paid to move rooms, it cost us 15 euros a night, but it was well worth it to get a good nights sleep. Food, we found was good, not a vast selection but what there was tasty. Pool area was clean and had plenty of beds,…

title: Lovely hotel
review: Found the staff very friendly hotel was spotless housemaids worked very hard , breakfast basic but dinner was very good, pool area and bar excellent had a great time rooms are dated but food aircon good all in all a great place for the budget we were on, would stay again

title: Not very good at all
review: Looks good from the outside, but the inside is very very dated and tired. We stayed as a family of 4 with a camp bed that doesn't fit in the room as it's tiny so we put it on balcony and used the mattress as a bed. The electric socket in the kitchen is at waist height and in the opposite side of the room to the work top so the kettle can't plugged into it. So I was given a extension that went across the kitchen to the worktop, which was very dangerous as you could easily drag the kettle onto yourself. Don't think you will get any sleep here because you won't,  none at all. The noise in that place is ridiculous it just travels through the whole building. Then there's the aircon which is non existent, literally does nothing. Then the staff who are just miserable and the pool bar…

title: Great location
review: Basic rooms. Great location, pool is great and hotel is close to beach, square and strip. Plenty of places to eat and drink. Only 10 Euro in a taxi to Magaluf which is a bit more lively than Santa Ponca

title: Room facilities
review: Thank you very much for your constructive criticism, we will consider all your comments and, thanks to them, we will try to improve our service because our goal is to obtain maximum satisfaction from our customers.

title: Ok place to stay
review: The one bedroom apartments are extremely small. 2 adults and 2 children were very very tight for space. The fold up bed was so uncomfortable that it was never used which meant 2 children and 1 adult slept in the 2 single beds shoved together. The other adult slept on the sofa bed in the ‘living area’. The kitchen would not fit 2 people at once and the one socket was on the far wall so the toaster and kettle had to be used either in the bedroom or next to the sofa bed. The hotel itself was kept very clean and looked very attractive, as did the pool area. The noise from neighbouring apartments was evident as was the neighbours snoring.

title: It's not the ritz!
review: Thank you very much for your constructive criticism, we will consider all your comments and, thanks to them, we will try to improve our service because our goal is to obtain maximum satisfaction from our customers.

title: Great location, nice enough hotel !!
review: Stayed here for a week in August.  Hotel is dated which we expected but it is very clean and tidy.  The beds are the thing I had most issue with.  All four beds very uncomfortable, they could definitely do with new mattresses.  Pool area very nice, you will need to get down at 8 am if you want a certain bed though as it can be like a stampede with people actually running to get beds which is very amusing !!  Also no floats allowed.  I would also like to recommend the Lazy Horse which is right opposite hotel.  We had breakfast there everyday and it was the best,  Location of this hotel is amazing and we would definitely stay here again.

title: Great Budget Hotel
review: Thank you very much for your constructive criticism, we will consider all your comments and, thanks to them, we will try to improve our service because our goal is to obtain maximum satisfaction from our customers.

title: Good place to stay
review: Visited in August with 3 children and couldn’t fault the hotel, rooms are spotlessly clean - a little dated but ticks all the boxes for what we needed. Pool area again spotless and well maintained, life guard on duty who kept everyone in check (as always a few Brits abroad who take liberties). Sunbeds are in demand, you can put towels out early but if you have not taken your bed by 10:30 the life guard does remove them, this is well publicised throughout the hotel but as always a few very unhappy with this policy when enforced - entertaining to watch though.  Hotel is in a great spot overlooking the cove and Santa Ponsa beach / main area about 10 minutes walk away - few bars and resturaunts close by but in a quiet spot. Excellent for families.

title: Great Apartments with Fantastic Views
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Beautiful location
review: Just came back from a 1 week stay in this hotel. Our room had a great sea view. The rooms were dated and the beds were quite uncomfortable, but had a mini kitchen with a fridge and hob, a good sized bathroom with a bath and shower and a small balcony with table and chairs.  To get the sunbeds you want by the pool in the morning, queue down by the entrance doors to the pool at 8:00am as that is when the doors open. You will find a swarm of people throwing towels on their chosen beds so I would recommend having your eye on certain beds and rushing to them before someone else gets there. You need to return back to your towels by 10:30am and if you don’t then the lifeguard will take your towels from your bed.  The pool is a good size and goes very deep, however there is a small…

title: TERRIBLE
review: I'm here for a week with my family, booked as I've stayed here before but it's been 10yrs, location is superb with beautiful sea views & you are right beside a stunning little cove. The rooms are ridiculous & the decor is older than me & I'm 45, the shower floods the bathroom & the sink leaks all over the floor, the view is horrendous, nothing but trees which our 30 ft high, why would anyone want to sit on there balcony to look at this! The beds are like lying on a board & the aircon is a joke, book somewhere else & avoid this hovel

title: View and location, but the rest....
review: We deeply lament reading that your stay at TRH Jardin del mar did not live up to your expectations, we would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements and offer to our guests a better service.

title: Enjoyable Stay
review: Iv rated the Jardin Del Mar 2.... 1 for the location, next to the lively Spanish Square... Plenty of bars, entertainment and craic to be had... My 2nd star is for the fabulous views from the hotel, looking over the bay...Just beautiful....   Now for the apartment.... The door into the apartment was older than me (38), which made my mother very anxious at night so she placed a chair up against it...  The air con, what air con?
