I had to hire a fan which want great but did the job..Next for the wall sockets, the one and only socket in the kitchen didn’t work... This made it difficult to make a cup of tea and the cooker didn’t work ... Not good for a self catering apartment ...   This hotel is in a prime area of Santa Ponsa and I really do believe with a total revocation of this…

title: VERY POOR ! Look elsewhere!! It really is that bad! Glad to be home!!
review: Thank you for let us know the issues that you had during your stay in our hotel.  First we would like to apologize for the inconvenience. We are working on improve our services and your opinions are the most important to do it.

title: Avoid!
review: Stayed here in August 2018 as a family of four for a week on HB basis.   Hotel is located only a 1 minute walk from Santa Ponsa Square and 20 minute walk to the main beach.  Room was clean and tidy. Main bedroom with 2 single beds. Living room with bed settee and camping bed. Very small kitchen area with sink , Kettle , fridge.  Decent sized bathroom.  Room had air conditioning which was needed due to 30+ degree temperatures , it kept the room comfortable without ever being cold.  Hotel restaurant was clean and food although I’m sure not to everyone’s choice was always had something to suit us.  Staff were friendly and attentive.   Pool area was busy , families with young children. Lots of sun beds although you had to queue early for their release at 8am. Any beds not occupied…

title: Ok hotel, good location.
review: Came here beginning of August with my wife and 2 kids. First impressions were that the pictures of the hotel, particularly the pool area are too generous. Don't get me wrong the hotel is nice but the pool is not half as big as what we expected and the rooms although adequate are very dated. The other negative is the fact that unless your willing to queue from 7am for sunloungers you won't get one. We didn't want our holiday ruined by this so chose to go to the beach or just sit at the pool bar in the hope some would come available, which they usually did mid afternoon. Now for the positives....the location is great. Only a 15 minute walk to the main sandy beach which is great and a 2 minute walk to numerous little coves where we took the kids snorkelling. In the evening again…

title: Great views shame about poolside cafe and restaurant
review: We would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements for the near future. hank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: U get what u pay for
review: Here for 2 weeks and I can’t complain about the view from the room as we are on the top floor in the centre of building and can see all over the bay and cove would of given more stars if it wasn’t for a couple of Things. The poolside cafe is always out of food and other stuff meaning you have to seek lunch elsewhere pretty much all the time you spend a day there, the hotel restaurant although we are self catering we decided to try it out for one night and the guy at the desk overcharged us even though we had the bill in front of us giving the correct price??????? Also the rooms air conditioning  is pathetic and might as well not be off, luckily the surrounding area has many bars and restaurants to choose from and way say you are better off going self catering then half board as…

title: Clean semi functional
review: Dear Guest,  We are very sorry for all inconvenience you have had. We will study your comments in order to improve our service. Thank you.  Best regards

title: Very poor
review: Just about to leave this hotel after a 5 night stay As everyone else says rooms are dated and in desperate need of a refurbishment But the rooms are spotless and we only needed to sleep in them, as we hardly used the hotel facilities The pool area is quite good, but there are some brilliant coves, right next to the pool, which we spent most the time in. The hotel is in a superb position, 1 minute from a family friendly square, 10/15 mins walk from the main bars and restaurants End of the day you get what u pay for

title: Great location
review: Rooms are dated and we had hundreds of ants on the first night. They did come quickly to spray it when i phoned about it. Pool isnt great if your not a good swimmer as its deep all over. There is a small seperate section but this is obviously busy with children.  The day time entertainment is poor. I didnt stay around for any evening entertainment so cant comment on that. Was self catering so didnt eat here. The self catering facilities are poor. There was one plug socket in kitchen area so cant have kettle and toaster on at same time. No microwave. Did have full size fridge/freezer which was good. Air con is TERRIBLE. I actually thought it wasnt working properly but was assured it was. Its ridiculous you have to pay for wifi. Its a poor connection and not worth it when theres…

title: Terrible
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your constructive criticism, we will take into account all your comments and thanks to them we will try to improve our service because our goal is to achieve the maximum satisfaction of our customers.  Best regards

title: Only good thing about this place is the location
review: Just finishing a long week here and honestly cannot wait to leave! The hotel alone needs completely done up top to bottom! Rooms are so dated with furniture older than me! Beds are rock hard and so uncomfortable and so hard to get a asleep at night due to hotel being really noisy can hear everything from next door to outside! The air conditioning in the room is terrible and with it being the warmest time of the year it's Defo needed! Within my week here the pool has been closed twice so kids haven't had much to do due to the entertainment being very poor! Would never recommend the hotel and if I had an option to rate 0 I would!

title: Decent hotel, great location
review: We deeply lament reading that your stay at TRH Jardin del mar did not live up to your expectations, we would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements and offer to our guests a better service.

title: Family fun
review: Just spent 10 days here and if I could have booked another place I would have moved! Sadly unable to find an alternative in the busy season! The location and views are great- and that’s where my praise ends When we arrived at 10.30 at night we were told they didn’t have a room for us so shipped up off to another apartment for one night! I was furious but unable to do anything about it- they said it was fine because they had upgraded us to a sea view room. I had specifically booked a side view because I knew it would be quiet and not as hot! If this happens to you stand your ground and ask for more compensation! They agreed in the end to give us s free breakfast, evening meal and free WiFi! WiFi is rubbish so don’t pay for this. Other gripes about this place- rooms not that…

title: Fab holiday!
review: Our first time in Santa Ponsa...and was a bit concerned after reading some reviews on here about the hotel! Didn't need to worry! Gorgeous view, will miss waking up to that! Half board option was excellent, fresh cooked authentic food, loads of choices and all 4 of us throughly enjoyed trying all the different fish/meat dishes along with rice, pasta, salads. Breakfast was also tasty, usual fry up then fresh fruit, yogurts and pastries. Kids loved the pool, pool bar was tasty and reasonably priced. 10 minute walk down to main beach and cove 30 seconds away! Hotel spotlessly clean, maybe a little dated and could of done with a bit more room in our apartment, but didn't spend that much time in there! Definitely recommend a sea view, we did quite a bit of exploring and days out and…

title: great view!
review: Dear Nia,  We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer the best service for making our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us.  We hope to see you again.

title: Great holiday
review: view is amazing! best we have had!...rooms are clean altho need updating, beds comfy..regular  fresh towels and bed linen, very clean hotel, we came here for the view and lovely deep pool!..altho it does have a separate small kids pool..altho VERY disappointed that no lilos etc are allowed!!! we were very upset as we have lots of fun with lilos!!...first time ever i have come across this ban!!....but all in all a good stay.....this hotel would be superb if it was all inclusive...or at least have free soft drinks or tea and coffee with evening meal....as tea and coffee and juice free with breakfast...plenty of sunbeds...but i am one of the crazies who are up at 7.30 waiting for pool area to open!!!...i would definitely recommend this hotel...staff are friendly too...safe in…

title: Great week
review: We would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements and offer to our guests a better service.  Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Great value for the money
review: Loved our holiday in Santa Ponsa, pool was great, our son loved it, beach bar was reasonable as well, but we mostly went to the supermarket for our drinks round the pool and no one moaned about it like you get in some apartments.  Room is very dated, the kitchen is tiny, i normally cook for our son before we go out for an evening but was too much hassle as there is no room whatsoever!  Pay the extra for a sea view, we didnt and regretted it when we arrived.  Great location for the square at night for kids.  Recommended restaurants "El Jardin" and "Royal Garden" food was excellent.  Xaloc more further down is my favourite - always head there when in Santa Ponsa.  We will definitely be back to Jardin Del Mar.

title: Rooms robbed
review: Was there in june two rooms robbed   opened whit keys    .   Rooms 700 and 701   old door locks    not safe to leave anything around . Needs to be up graded   .and make sure you count whats in your wallet  in the safe .heard a man saying he had more in .he thinks someone was at it .. the safe in beside recption.

title: Rooms need a total upgrade.
review: Myself, husband and 13 year old son  arrived the 30th of June til the 8th of July for a self catering holiday.We booked this holiday to accommodate our son who is a poor eater. The kitchen had no microwave or oven and had tiny cups and glasses.It had only 1 socket which was attach to the light switch!I don't cook much on holiday but this was hopeless.We had to upgrade our room because the first room allocated to us had the balcony overlooking a wall and car park.This upgrade cost us 70 euros.The air con was not very good .Simple things like no airer on the balcony for wet towels.The table on the balcony was like one out of toysRus. The towels in the bathroom were horrible,paper thin.The pool was lovely but very deep for young children 1.5 metres although it had a baby pool. I…

title: Be careful
review: We booked this for 4 adults and 2 kids we did see the reviews but our friends where on a budget the rooms are clean but it could do with a up date the rooms are very noisy you could hear everything ,we hired a car and I asked beforehand if there's a carpark nope you have to park on the road if you can find a spot I did find a carpark about 5 mins walk away no WiFi you have to pay for it and it's for one device only would I stay again no way

title: Nice hotel
review: Lovely hotel, friendly staff, clean, good food, excellent location.  We went as a family of 4 (2 adults and 2 teenage girls) for 1 week and we all loved it. We will definitely be going back. Plenty of shops, restaurants and bars all around the hotel, and our view from the balcony was beautiful.

title: Summer hols in Santa Ponsa
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardín del Mar since our goal is to offer a good service and that our clients feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust you have placed in us, we hope to see you again.

title: 4 night stay
review: This hotel is perfect. Cheap and cheerful. Basic but we only wanted it to sleep in and get dressed in. The whole hotel was immaculate, pool are lovely and clean. Didn't eat here so can't comment on the foods. Lobby staff were great. The square is a 1minute walk away and the strip is 10minutes walk away. It has a spar right outside the front entrance. It really is perfectly situated. Cleaners are brilliant and TV has quite a few English channels I was surprised at this. Mark Anthony's was my favourite place to go to for breakfast. Thank you Jardin Del Mar for a lovely stay xx

title: Great value for money
review: Pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar since our goal is to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust has placed in us, hope to see you again.

title: Not what I expected
review: My 5 star review is based on the fact that this the 3star is a perfect description. We only leave tomorrow our stay has been most enjoyable. Pool is clean room is clean the bar in the pool area and snacks are a cheaper option than heading out.The food was prepared quickly and tasted great! There is a square just opposite the hotel which has ebetertainment for both adults and children there is no need to stay in the hotel for their nightly disco which the kids will enjoy. There was no safe in our room, however they did have one at reception which was fine as we were usually passing there to leave anyway.  I suppose this meant that the staff at reception could keep an eye on your belongings better as well. The Staff where friendly and appreciated that we learnt the basic…

title: Good value, average hotel.
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.

title: Family friendly.
review: My overall summary is in this case you really do get what you pay for with this hotel. There are a lot of positive and negative points about our visit.  The good points are there was a great variety of English channels on our TV, the bar and restaurant outside by the pool had wonderful food at a great price and the drinks were a good quality too, the pool was very big and clean in comparison to other hotels, the cleaning maids did very thorough jobs and were respectful at all times, the shower in the bathroom was better than expected and we had a lovely beach view from our balcony. The bad points are we payed for a double bed and when we got into our room it was just two single pushed together which made it really uncomfortable and was an issue throughout our stay, the indoor…

title: Lads holiday
review: 6 lads aged around 19 stayed here, it's about a 10 minute walk to the strip but it's grand, we were surprised that we were the only people our age here but it actually went in our favour, it was chilled in the day and then after nights out we had no problem bringing people back with us... The hotel staff were very sound, if you're going with a family it's grand and if you're going on a lads or girls holiday you know you'll actually get a bit of sleep in to recover and you can still get the birds back without the hotel staff refusing them which happens elsewhere

title: 4 stars for a 4 star hotel
review: Dear Guest,  TWe would like to thank you for your compliments. We hope to see you again.  Best regards

title: week away
review: This is my most honest review I've ever done and this will tell u everything u need to know. The hotel is great, we went as a family for a weed half board. The food was great was was different each day, you even have ur own table for the rest of ur stay. Full English breakfast in the morning was great, the apartments were decent in size and had plates, glasses kettle and safe at the ready. Rooms were cleaned 3-4 times a week and they did a good job. We recommend paying more for sea view as it's brilliant to chill in the morning in a decently sized balcony next the the sea. There was regular entertainment for kids and adults but mondays had no entertainment (their day off) there was ping pong tournaments and pool which was great. The pool is big in size but very deep (2.55m)…

title: Great location. Pool stairs need sorting
review: Dear Guest,  We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied.  Thank you very much for your time and the trust placed in us and we hope to see you again.  Best regards

title: Fab
review: spent a week here which was enough, negatives,staff not very helpfull, room old and dated, air con useless, food and drink poolside expensive,positives, ideal location, spar for groceries opposite square with bars and restaurants 2 mins away 10min walk into santa ponsa,

title: Terrible
review: Just back from a weekend staying here would never go back the staff are so unhelpful rooms are out dated with ants crawling about in the rooms and bed I had to get all my clothes cleaned as they got into my case so the staff washed them and ruined them they never even said sorry. We also paid for a sea view what we got was a 12 foot wall and bottom floor. Never again

title: Just ok
review: Thank you for let us know the issues that you had during your stay in our hotel.  First we would like to apologize for the inconvenience. We are working on improve our services and your opinions are the most important to do it.

title: Stag doo
review: Have been going to this hotel over the years.  Stayed last September and find it seriously needs some tlc.  Hasn't really changed or kept up with changes.  Beautiful sea views but bed liner the same this last  20 years.

title: Clean, friendly but beware of sea view
review: Thank you for your opinion.all .We will study your comments in order to improve our service.

title: Not worth the money
review: Decent enough for a stag. No hassle at all pool area was superb. We didn’t try the restaurant but tried the snack bar so can’t fault any them. So decent enough. Perfect location for the square and also few shops and restaurants just outside so 3 stars is perfect for the Jardin.

title: Terrible customer service !!! Beware of “sea view”!!
review: I booked this apartment specifically because the views from the room looked beautiful. I paid extra for a sea view and stated in special requests that it was a special occasion for myself and my partners 30th so a room with a great view would be amazing. This was a treat from me to him for his birthday so just wanted to secure a nice room and make it special for him. When I arrived the lady on the reception first of all was not welcoming at all and checked us on a room on the ground floor right in the corner of the hotel at the pool (not a sea view like I paid for) when I went back just to say oh this isn’t a sea view she was very defensive and basically argued that it was a sea view an older man also interrupted and said “a request is just a request!” I said I understand that…

title: great hotel
review: We apologize for this issue with the reception staff, who normally are friendly and helpful, We will revise our procedures to guarantee a correct service from each and every staff member but we would like to explain that we allocate our rooms in accordance with the room type selected upon reservation like it was your case.  Best regards .

title: Would visit again
review: Staff very welcoming and friendly pool area was great and well supervised by lifeguard Spotlessly clean in good location with good views was in room 125 not a great veiw  Worth paying extra for sea view had a great holiday would recommend this hotel especially for families with young children my grandson had a great time.

title: Amazing Sea View
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your comments and the trust placed in us. We hope to see you again.  Best regards

title: Drab hotel
review: Stayed here for a long weekend on a self catering basis. We found rooms to be clean and beds comfortable. The pool area looks over the sea and has a bar which also served food which we found to be very nice for a lunch time snack. We found the pool bar staff to be exceptionally friendly and helpful. Only negative was lack of towels in the room and the towels that were available were very small.

title: Location fabulous however not the best
review: We have been 'holidaying' in Santa Ponsa for many years due to family having a villa there, however this is no longer the case we decided to  stopped here for a long weekend over the May bank holiday. I have to say the location is great however the hotel is in a desperate need of TLC... The beds were by far the most uncomfortable I have tried to sleep in, the room was stifling as the Air Con did not work despite asking on many occasions! The toaster had to be replaced, our cooking facilities didn't work - good job 'Arkles' was over the road. I found the hotel staff incredibly unhelpful & not at all bothered with your requests... They never even asked if everything was ok & if we had a nice time on departure! The pool side is great though & a lovely view over the bay, they need…

title: very nice hotel
review: We deeply lament reading that your stay at TRH Jardin del mar did not live up to your expectations, we would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements and offer to our guests a better service.

title: Very good
review: back from 6 days at this very nice hotel with husband and two granddaughters, 8 and 16. The hotel is spotless and the staff are welcoming and helpful. The pool area is lovely with beautiful views of the bay. There is also an indoor pool and a small cove which can be reached by a few steps from the hotel.  There you can swim and use inflatables.The water is crystal clear. There is a pool bar which sells drinks, ice creams and meals which are very nice, served by friendly and very efficient staff.  The restaurant serves food freshly cooked and while there is a good variety, I would say not as much as other hotels we have stayed in.  There was nothing for our 8year old. She lived on chips and fresh bread in the evening and eggs for breakfast. Even our 16yearold found it difficult…

title: 5 Days of sun
review: Thank you for your comment on Trip Advisor. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the view of our hotel.  Pleased to read that he has enjoyed their stay at TRH Jardin del mar since our goal is to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust has placed in us, hope to see you again.

title: Nice Apartments
review: Very nice , clean hotel , a mistake was made on booking (sea view with balcony requested) we got basement, but after chatting staff at Resception, the alternative room was found (2 days later on Saturday) beautiful view from balcony , well equipped room , staff very friendly and accommodating   .. Will Defo return to this hotel

title: A good hotel to stay in Santa Ponça
review: Friendly staff, good location and clean... Plenty of amenities around and not far from Magaluf and Palmanova . The only thing I have to point is the mattres, was hard as a brick. Besides that it is a good hotel to stay if you go to Santa Ponça , we recommend

title: 5 day chill
review: Pleased to read that he has enjoyed their stay at TRH Jardin del mar since our goal is to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust has placed in us, hope to see you again.

title: hit an miss
review: Reception staff very good stag party arrived just before us in rooms just below my room.did.nt even go to the room they knew me from other stays there and moved us straight away.class.Arkles across the road top breakie

title: Tired and dated apartments
review: Dear Guest,  We allways try to do the best for you because we want to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied.  Thank you for your visit and we hope to see you again.  Best regards

title: Nice hotel
review: only booked two weeks before easter. picked this because of the view, but then again if we'd have really done our research there are probably cheaper places with better views - caesars next door or the verdemar? arrived early, couldn't check in early. paid for a sea view, was given 307, not great. outdoor pool wasn't heated, so tried the indoor, not that warm either. people reserve sunbeds and there don't seem to be enough when its busy so another reason for walking to the beach every day instead. food quality was ok - never changing breakfast, dinner hit an miss, one night great, the next not so much to choose from. on the last morning woken at 4am by returning young ladies in high spirits, not helped by the hotels design - no doors on the corridors and stairs and also probably…

title: Wouldn’t recommend
review: I stayed here last Tuesday, right up to Saturday, don’t get me wrong the holiday was amazing, but the hotel on the other had was a bit disappointing, I booked the hotel on Tuesday the 17th of April, from that Tuesday until we went I rung the hotel everyday, they told me they would contact me back roughly 5-7 times a day, I then kept asking for the hotel manager and the refused to do so, I was also charge at the hotel more than suspected, that was less money out of our travel fund, the person next door to us kept complaining saying we were making to much noice, but we could not have been, this was at 5:40am, we were all in bed, and was awoken by an angry woman cliaming we were to loud, the floor staff were absolutely amazing, no disappointment from them, they did everything they…

title: Sea view room
review: My partner and I had went on a 6 day holiday. Upon arrival the hotel seemed nice, the reception was marble floors and was clean enough. The reception staff were friendly enough although they didn’t offer a safe when we checked in both times ( we had two bookings).   When we went to the rooms I was shocked and not for a good reason. We were given a 1 bedroom apartment. The whole room needed renovated. The door lock was a key with another one to put into the wall for electricity. You were only given one key to the room which was a draw back. The door was stiff and felt like it was ancient. The room was made with an old fashioned wooden style. The kitchen felt like was going to fall apart so I didn’t want to use it. The standard of cleanliness of the room was disappointing. Under…

title: Very average
review: Dear Guest,  We deeply lament reading that your stay at TRH Jardin del mar did not live up to your expectations, we would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements and offer to our guests a better service.  Best regards

title: First family holiday - 3 Night stay at Jardin Del Mar - April 2018
review: Very average hotel with a nice setting. Don't get anything other than a sea view room as the rest are terrible. Even the sea view rooms are subpar in my opinion and need some money spent.  We went for a side sea view which as you will see in the photo below was a complete waste of time. As soon as we saw the room we went to reception and upgraded to a sea view which cost £100 more.  Wasn't a lot going on and the restaurants are very hit and miss.  I'd recommend manolos at top of the hill, pacos for evening.  The lazy horse across the road and the Italian cafe at the end of the road are good for daytime food.

title: Very disappointing
review: Dear Guest,  We would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because these give us the opportunity to make improvements for the near future.  Best regards

title: Holiday
review: Absolutely fantastic hotel 2nd visit going back in September love santapona and this hotel is perfectly situated for the square where there is loads of great entertainment the staff in the jardin del mar are great Pedro on reception is very helpful and always has a welcoming smile and lolly our cleaner was the happiest person on earth all the staff cannot do enough to help you.  The bar restaurant has food which is nice and served promptly and yet again pleasantl.  I just can’t fault this hotel.

title: Relaxing Easter break
review: My husband daughter and myself styed here from 3-10 April. We had a lovely relaxing break at this hotel. It is in a good location not far from main square and about ten minutes down to the min beach and shops. Overall the hotel is nice with indoor and outdoor pool (outdoor was freezing but think due to time of year)and limited entertainment only the kids disco on during the evening apart from Sunday and a no entertainment at all on. Monday but think this is also due to time of year. The hotel food in the restaurant ws lovely different variety during  breakfast and dinner. Pool bar wasnt open during the time we were there but you can get snacks at a lunchtime from the bar inside next to the restaurant. They could do with more staff on at peak times at the bar as sometimes service…

title: Easter Break
review: We stayed from the 4th to the 11th of April and found the staff friendly and helpful, the room was clean , we had a sea view room . The views across the bay are amazing. The hotel is at the top of the hill near the square and will keep you fit if walking down to the beach.We went self catering so did not use the restaurant or bar. we would certainly recommend the hotel as it is value for money and has fridge cooker etc. and supermarkets minutes away. Would book again

title: Cheap and cheerful
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardín del Mar since our goal is to offer a good service and that our clients feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust you have placed in us, we hope to see you again.

title: Easter holiday as a family of 4.
review: Travelled as part of a larger group the children in the group ranged in age from 18 months old to 9 years old.  We did not pay a huge amount for the hotel so was not expecting 5* luxury. Check in was simple and the receptionist was friendly.  Rooms basic but does what it needs to. Kitchen facilities were also basic but could easily knock up breakfast and lunch which we did quite often.  The sofa bed in the lounge was not comfortable to sleep on particularly because it creaked so loudly every time you move.  I would not like to stay in the hotel when it is peak session as the noise from other guests even at low season became unbearable. I'm not sure if I just had bad luck with the room but every night there was some disturbance that woke me. The walls are so thin you can hear…

title: Easter break
review: Clean hotel . Lovely sea view was half board and food was good..... nothing special the usual hotel buffet style but always fresh and clean. Mini disco for kids in evening and bar prices reasonable. Pools clean and nice size. Overall a good hotel for the price   Santa ponsa itself is not for us looks very tired and just a constant loop of tat shops fast food and tired looking pubs. Beach is nice though.

title: April in Santa Ponsa
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your kind coments in Tripadvisor.  We hope to see you again.  Best regards

title: Can’t wait to get home
review: The hotel is far side of Santa Ponsa it is up hill  so need to have good walking feet, or pay for a taxi.. The room was lovely and we very impressed it was spacious and had a view which was fantastic we had room 403 which was the reception level.  The kitchen and fridge a bonus seeing we were half board.  The bathroom was nice towels could have been a bit thicker but ok clean. The food ........ we were able to find something each night to enjoy, however breakfast could have been better.... maybe grapefruit, pineapple chunks another cereal as apposed to sugar puffs. The entertainment was ideal IF  you had children nothing at all for adults each evening but plenty outside of the hotel.  The pool and outside area was kept beautiful  as you can imagine pool freezing in April.   The…

title: Lovely Easter Break
review: Lovely view tired room. Went down to dinner ,food was cold and I actually got an upset stomach,when I told the receptionist I was informed as no one else had complained ,maybe I’m not used to the food. Ha I’ve eaten all over the world and only had an upset tummy once. Today I left my purse at the bar, a minute or even less I realised my mistake and went running back, nothing!!! , but I was the only one at the bar, I have lost all my money. An hour later I go back to see if it’s been found, yes it has ,it’s sitting behind the bar with my safe deposit paper on top of it, of course the money has gone . No one knows where it was found !!!!!!. I paid for half board but have only eaten one dinner , greasy potato crisp type things, tinnned carrots( there was no other veg ) and a wafer…

title: Stunning views
review: We went to Mallorca for a 5 day break and stayed at this hotel. We stayed in a room with side sea view. In general we loved it, but keep in mind that in April it won't be hot. The first day was extremely windy.  We arrived on Good Friday and wanted to upgrade to a room with full sea view and were told that the hotel was full - I tend to doubt that and think that the fact that we arrived at 2am was a factor for that response   Positives: Nice clean room Very well located, near a beautiful beach Nice view  Balcony Good choice of food for breakfast and dinner (we didn't have lunch there) Cleaned every 2 days, or more often if you ask a cleaner  Indoor pool Outdoor pool Play area for little ones - my 6 years old said that was the perfect hotel for her Lots of places to eat  Visit…

title: Very dated and tired.
review: We booked a fairly last minute get away to Majorca which was a first for us both. We arrived at 10.30 am to find room was already prepared and the staff on reception were pleasant and informative. The room that we were given was 426 on the ground floor and it overlooked the car park and a small stream in a ravine.We asked to upgrade to another room and were offered the keys to two other rooms to view. We choose 707 on the top floor with a stunning view over the bay and pool area and we were charged 70 euros for this.  The rooms are very tired looking and dated. However they are very clean and have all of the basic necessities for a little self catering. They still have old pine doors and the tiles in the bathroom are not looking their best to say the least. On one night it…

title: Great hotel and location
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking your time to write a comment on Tripadvisor. We deeply lament to read that your stay at TRH Jardin del mar did not live up to your expectations, we would like to thank you for sharing your observations with us because this gives us the opportunity to make improvements and offer to our guests a better service.  Best regards

title: Short break
review: Booked For the 4 day break and was pleasantly surprised. Hotel staff are very friendly and helpful. The hotel overlooks the bay at santa ponsa and you can walk along the coastline into town 10 mins away. Hotel is very clean and rooms are comfortable with everything you need. Indoor and outdoor pools nice bar area and restaurant. Worth a visit if only for the stunning view and little coves.

title: Nice apartments
review: Dear Ingrid  Pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar since our goal is to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust has placed in us.  We hope to see you again.  Best regards

title: Holiday
review: Arrived late Saturday night, great welcome but only to find no reservation. Am sorted with in 5 min on showing our voucher. Given room 424 on main floor, not  great view, small and typical Spanish deco but could do with being up dated slightly worn look. Blackout curtains torn and repaired with duck tape, but who cares I'm working class and don't expect the Ritz for what we paid. Rest of the hotel was fresh and modern. Low season main bar in reception closed and also pool bar. Restaurant looked nice and plenty of choice but chose to eat out. In door pool was hot just like going into a bath. Would I stay again yes but more into season. A must is the Chinese across the road, bit expensive but worth it. 15 min walk into main town. Magaluf 10€ in taxi. Thank you got out hospitality..

title: Great hotel in Santa Ponsa.
review: A good hotel with good atmosphere and staff that looked after us very well. Santa Ponsa has a lot of bars and good restaurants and the beach is lovely and clean. Entertainment could be better. Good for families.

title: Best hotel
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardín del Mar since our goal is to offer a good service and that our clients feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust you have placed in us, we hope to see you again.

title: Sea View and cheap price.
review: Loved jardin del mar beautiful hotel so clean and smells so fresh everywhere, the pool was lovely with lots of room to walk around your sun beds,we had BB,food was delicious the staff were very welcoming 😀 I hope to go back again to this hotel best part is having sea view fabulous looking out at the sea. so missing you jardin del mar 😢but as they say we will be back

title: Good location and fabulous views
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardín del Mar since our goal is to offer a good service and that our clients feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust you have placed in us, we hope to see you again.

title: Fab place
review: Budget travellers choose. Basic accommodation with basic rooms. Magnificent view to sea, take sea view room. Nice pools. Nearby nice “Cala”.  Breakfast basic bacon, eggs, sausages, beans, coffee, cheese, fruits… Beds are hard, but hotel is super clean, friendly staff. Best part is view, location and sunsets. If you look luxury, this is not your thing. But nice environment and location to explore island with best possible view to sea, with reasonable price, this is your place.

title: Perfect location
review: Myself rmy friend stayed here for a week, it's a great location 10mins from strip and beach, also has nice restaurants pubs and shop's around it also very close to the square (although) it was closed when we were here (Oct 6-13th).  The apartment's are basic but we found them clean and had a change of towels most day's, we didn't have a nice view looking at carpark, my only complaint about the apartments is that they are poorly stocked, no wine glasses or can/bottle opener and a microwave would be good.  We found the staff to be friendly and when our kettle wasn't working they changed it straight away.  I would recomend this property the pool area has a lovely sea view and a nice snack bar, there is also a nice walk from the back of the property to the centre of town (edlerly or…

title: Great stay!
review: I stayed at the Jarden del Mar for 4 nights. Was a good hotel clean and the staff was ok, Nice room with a side view of the sea. The food was ok not much to pick from but was hot so was happy. The only bad thing I can say really is that don't bother emailing them for requests as they don't get back to you, I had to call a few times to speak to the right person.

title: Good location
review: Good location, plenty of shops nearby and a lovely walk to the centre if you go on the sea path. Room not massive but adequate for 3 people. The only drawback for us was that we had a great big tree outside which covered most of the view of the sea from the balcony.( Was ok if you stood on a chair though!!). Go for a higher floor if you want a brilliant view. We had room 114. All in all, a good place to stay, staff were very pleasant and helpful.

title: Amazing hotel
review: Great views, balcony just in front of the sea and swimmingpool over it.   Big swimmingpool where you can enjoy the sun during the day or the shows that their animation offers.  Good food and good location at the end of Santa Ponsa.  I recommend it !!!

title: Perfect location
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardín del Mar since our goal is to offer a good service and that our clients feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust you have placed in us, we hope to see you again.

title: For one night only
review: Booked a break away with my husband and decided to extend our stay and fly out a day earlier , I couldn’t get the hotel we were staying in for the rest of the stay so I decided to just book into here for one night only , and thank god it was one night only .  On arriving at reception it was clean and spacious however on going to the elevator to take the lift to our room on the first floor , with just two of us it was like being squashed into a sardine tin . We walked along to our room and the door felt very insecure ,  When we went into the room it was just a box standard one bed apartment what you would expect for 2/3 Star .  The patio door was open and had no way of locking the door , our front door felt very insecure and had no way of locking it either , not something I would…

title: Enjoy , you're on holiday.
review: Yes there are some negatives with this "3" star hotel  but many positives. I upgraded to the sea view room on the sixth floor and yes the room was basic we didn't spend much time in there . As mentioned before the view is lovely and the perfect tonic to unwind. We were ( and still are ) a family with a seven and five year old and spent most days around the pool which was very clean , early October and we never reserved a sun bed .  I found all the staff excellent and very hard working , engage with them and you will have a laugh . Maybe we was lucky with the families we met , many of them who return each year but we met some lovely people and a wonderful  mix of Irish , Scottish, English and European , even a couple of stag do's who were impeccably behaved.

title: Mr C
review: Stayed here the start of oct. Check in seamless the guy with the glasses more than helpful and always said hello to us. Asked for 2 rooms together and was given them right away. Safes are kept in reception again this was not a problem. Room is basic then again it was a basic price so no real complaints. Kettle and toaster in a stocked kitchen suited our needs. BBC & ITV channels on the flat screen tv.   Pool area indoor and out are fantastic and are complimented by amazing views. Went self catering and ate at Arkles which is opposite the hotel for breakfast go to Arkles 2 just around the corner up the hill they offer special breakfast deals not offered at the 1 opposite.   The hill can be a bit of a mission up and down to the strip but tended to use the costal path but may be a…

title: Good for what it is
review: Basic hotel/apartment but have no complaints. Pool decent but it has an amazing view. Pool bar food decent for lunch and not expensive. Rooms kept nice and clean but bed wasn't the best. Would come back

title: Just alright
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardín del Mar since our goal is to offer a good service and that our clients feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust you have placed in us, we hope to see you again.

title: Nice wive, but be aware so you don’t miss it!!
review: Came with my girlfriend and son with girlfriend. In the add it says “all rooms with ocean-view ” we got shown to our rooms and it was very bad. Just a concrete wall to look at and no ocean-view. It smelled from the sour outside and a lot of noise from a aggregator. We went to the front desk and complained. There they told us that you have to order with ocean-view. This was not possible to read from the place we ordered. We had to pay a extra 15 € pr room for each night.  The view is great but the rooms are a bit old. Very hard beds. I have traveled a lot and I think this hotel is very average. A bit noisy to. But points for the view when you pay for it. Next time I think I will go another place.

title: A week's break
review: Expected better quality  for 3 star. Reception staff not helpful and I paid for a superior  room but it was far from it. Would  not go back. Had to clean the room before I unpacked. Good view. Room was good size but needs to be cleaner  and fridge fixed.

title: Poor hotel
review: The beds were so hard ever time we moved it was like turning over on a slab of concrete  The toaster couldn’t be used as the lead was so short there was no where to plug it in  The air conditioning in the bedroom didn’t work  Every time we flushed the toilet the lid fell off   Overall a very poor quality hotel

title: Great location, twenty five minutes from airport
review: Good apart hotel, good to have kettle, fridge, etc. A microwave would be a good addition. Staff exceptional.  Good idea to get room with sea view, lively cafe and bar opposite, but fairly quiet location. Large sandy beach close by.

title: Dont book this hotel
review: Very dated tired worn out rooms, beds are like sleeping on concrete, air con doesnt work. Nice location communal areas clean and ok. Pool space good.was self catering so unsure what food was like, we left this hotel and booked into another for the rest of our week.

title: Excellent Stay
review: Stayed here in an apartment for a week with my husband had a lovely apartment 601, fab sea views, no noise, no traffic, only noise at night was the sea! Very well located, beach 10 mins walk and also same distance to the strip. The square only 5 mins walk. Lots of lovely restaurants close by. Excellent all round would come back again Thanks

title: Terrific one week.
review: We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardín del Mar since our goal is to offer a good service and that our clients feel satisfied. Thank you very much for your time and the trust you have placed in us, we hope to see you again.

title: tired but clean
review: 2 friends & myself all stayed for a wk in a studio apt, self catering. The hotel is ideally situated near the square & was spotlessly cleaned almost every day, its in a terrific position with sea views from our balcony. We have booked again for next yr with sea views requesting 3rd floor & above for superb views, this is my 3rd time in this hotel.

title: Lovely 5 days
review: stayed b&b for 1 week mid september, had superior seaview room with huge balcony, room was large with seperate lounge, room basically furnished but clean and acceptable. walls paper thin and woken early morning by neighbours returning from nights out.breakfast very good, did not try dinner, lounge was very quiet on the 1 evening we tried for a drink. ideally situated for local restaurants and the square for entertainment. would not visit santa ponsa again, there are much nicer resorts in majorca

title: Great hotel
review: Stayed here Monday to Friday in a self catering apartment with sea view and it was lovely. Staff were helpful, nice clean apartment and pool area. Hotel close to shops bars and restaurants, lovely view of a cove near by and beach a 10 min walk. Definitely will return.

title: Mr
review: Positives about this hotel. It's very well cleaned and can't fault it in that way. It's location is quite ideal, far enough away that it's quiet but still very close to everything you want to do in sant ponsa. Just across the road is the solana restaurant which is the highest rated in town on trip advisor, it really is lovely and excellent value. Negatives about this hotel. Payed to upgrade and then again to upgrade the upgrade but was very disappointed with the room. Everything looking very tired and dated now. I'm sure nothing much has changed since it was built. Had a front facing supposedly luxurious room but was on the first floor so didn't get much of a view because we were too low. Looked over the roof of the dining room below which also blocked much of the view over the…

title: Great location and views
review: Stayed here recently, we paid for a sea view room which was well worth the extra money, view was gorgeous overlooking the pool and sea. Room was adequate although a little dated but clean and cleaned regularly with regular towel changes. Check in was quick and the people on reception were very friendly. Pool area is nice , we always got a sun bed but it was September which was quieter. We found the location to be perfect, right near to the square which had good entertainment on every night and is good for families, some lovely restaurants near by and only a short walk into the centre of santa ponsa, we walked to the beach several times. Would stay again

title: Beautiful Location I Didn't Want To Go Home
review: I visited the reviews here before going on my holidays and felt a bit downhearted, so I tried to focus on the positive reviews instead. I have to say, I loved this hotel. Yes it has some faults, but then most do in the 3 star category, but any faults it had it made up in terms of location. We arrived early evening and I had emailed a couple of weeks prior to ask if we could have a room above floor 4 and we were lucky to receive it. In fact I felt like we were blessed with one of the best rooms in the hotel (although I have nothing to compare to). We had room 520 and the biggest balcony I have ever seen overlooking the sea view. It ajoined to room 519's balcony (with a divider as part of it), but it was fine, totally private anyway. Checking in was pretty smooth, I had read on…

title: Lovely!
review: We stayed here as a couple for a week self catering and we can't really fault this hotel! The check in was quick & easy and took 5 minutes. The pool area is lovely. The pool is actually alot bigger than it looks in the pictures and the view is absolutely gorgeous! We never struggled to get a sunbed in the sunshine even though we usually headed down about 11am but maybe its because we went out of season. Can't comment on the food as we went self catering. The rooms were a little dated but as we dont spend much time in the room we didnt care much! Overall we had a lovely stay here and would definitely return.

title: TRH Jardin del Mar Review
review: Our holiday to Jardin del Mar in Santa Ponsa started in disaster.  After travelling for 10 hours we arrived at the hotel at midnight, feeling grubby and tired, only to be told that there was no room available for us!  The gentleman on reception did not even try to apologise which was so frustrating.  We paid for a room in that hotel and so I cannot understand why there was not a room available?  They then shipped us down to Deya appartments in the centre of the resort.  What an absolute dirty excuse for accommodation!  No working air-con, dirty floors and bathroom door did not close.  We finally got into bed at 1am when the music started on the street - this went on until 6am when everyone started killing each other before eventually it went silent.  Surely the least that should…

title: Good hotel and good value
review: Staff at front desk very friendly and helpful  Room practical and clean everything you needed I would go back if I ever go back to Santa ponsa I don't think I will didn't like resort one bit butt hotel very good

title: Excellent Family Holiday
review: Lovely hotel, fantastic location. Staff very helpful. Superior rooms excellent but they have 2 types of superior rooms; 1 with bigger balcony but slightly smaller room and other with smaller balcony with slightly larger rooms - we was given the smaller balcony but wanted to change to the bigger balcony which we loved - sunbeds on balcony and huge balcony with patio doors in bedroom and dining/sitting room area which could also be used as bedroom. We have stayed here twice now and would return again. Room wasn't cleaned as often as should be; only cleaned once in a week. Needs better air conditioning in both rooms; cannot feel it at all in the bedroom but believe you can hire fan from reception

title: Lovely
review: Only stayed for a week, the staff here are really helpful and polite, nothing was any troupble. The swimming pool is lovely and clean and with a lifeguard all of the time, everything is kept nice and tidy and the location is perfect. The room was fine, the folding bed was a little doubtful but then we only need a place the sleep. We didnt go half board but we did use the bar by the pool for food and drinks and this was brilliant, again the staff here were great and the food was lovely. Happy to come again because we had such a lovely welcome and we actually felt rested, thank you..

title: Fantastic time
review: It was our second time staying at the Jardin del Mar, we had a 7 night stay. Our room was on an upper floor and we had a fantastic view. Breakfast was included in our stay there was lots of choice, we had no complaints about the food. Our room had plenty of space and was cleaned almost everyday of our stay. We didn't have any problem with noise at night time. Reception staff were friendly and helpful. Sun beds were reserved very early at the pool each day this didn't bother us as we go to the beach instead or the small cove beside the hotel. Hotel is perfectly situated and is a short walk to beach, main strip and is 2 mins from the square which is perfect for kids. Some great restaurants nearby Las Olas and El Ceibo.  We have tried a lot of apartments in Santa Ponsa and the…

title: Long weekend Break
review: We're just abck from a 4 night break and the TRH Jardin delMar and were very impressed.  we had a 3:00 am checkin which wentsmoothly and were very happy with our side sea view from the balcony.  Rooms were perfect, very clean and a good size.  Breakfast each morning was good, with a good hot and cold food selection.  Staff were very helpful but dodn;t need to have much interaction with them.  Safety deposit boxes located in reception area bit of a pain as you still have to carry the safe key with you at all times.  There is no safe in the rooms.  Maybe, once into September itis off-season as there were no issues getting a lounger, any part of he day.  Location wise the hotel is perfect. Greate views over the bay, down to the beach. The sea front walk to beach takes 10 / 15…

title: shocking
review: arrived to find the room not ready and was told to come back later,  so went for some refreshments while we waited. finally got in the room at 4.20 to find it very dated there was stale food under the cupboard in kitchen and sofa in lounge, the small bin had not been emptied the sheet and pillow case on 1 of the beds was stained and a long black hair on the pillow, while we was there from the 30 of august till the 6 September there was the annual festival on so for the whole stay of our holiday we didn't get much sleep as the music and fire works was that loud you couldn't sleep, there was 3 young ladies staying in a room further down from us and unfortunately there room had been entered and money ipod an ipad taken but the hotel was unhelpful towards there and was told if other…

title: Very helpful
review: Been going to this hotel on and off for 40 years been back each of the last 6 years being there  May 17 and decided to have my 70th here with 19 members of my family August 17 . Normally get the same room which cannot always be guaranteed  but when they found out it was my 70th they met my request and left Wine & fruit in our room the stay although very busy ( we don't normally go in Aug)  we found the pool and service good. Reception folk very accommodating as usual if they can do something they will. Back again Oct 17 for end of the year break.

title: Great stay!!!
review: Had a fantastic 10 nights here, staff very friendly and helpful couldn't do enough for you if you needed anything especially Ramon my son loved him he's very good,  rooms are a good size the only thing is they need updated! Picked a sea view and it was great!!  But it's great value for money! Cheap and cheerful!! We where self catering but had meals at the bar which where tasty it was a good choice and great portion sizes for the price would think about going half board next time!! We will definitely be back again and enjoyed every min of our stay!! Couldn't really fault it!!!  Thanks for making out holiday enjoyable and looking forward to staying again 😊

title: its ok
review: stayed for 10 nights and you get what you pay for here . Pretty basic  but clean . view from our room was good overlooking the pool and the sea. Pretty noisy on an evening with kids running wild, shouting from the down stairs bar .We had to ask for extra pillows as the ones in the room where like sleeping on cig papers . The food is VERY basic not a lot of choice and if you would like a sun bed then you would have to get up at stupid oclock to get one , as when we went down for breakfast 8 30 ish every sun bed had a towel on so you had no chance of bagging a bed. would not stay here again .

title: Pay for a sea view, nice hotel
review: Stayed for 10 nights, very happy with accommodation for the price paid, kitchen area very small and ill equipped if you are planning to self cater, we were half board so it didnt bother us at all. Pretty clean everywhere, food was adequate and fresh, not too much choice, but we didnt starve. Pool area too small really for the amount of apartments in the hotel, we went to the beach every day as we werent prepared to get up at 7am to bag 4 sunbeds. Hotel was fairly noisy at night, mainly due to the sheer volume of rooms and guests, banging doors, screaming kids etc...evening entertainment was pants if i am honest, but we went out most nights to the square which is 2 mins walk away, all in all I am pleased to say I believe we got slightly more than we paid for, was happy with our…

title: Anne D and family
review: Have returned from a fantastic stay at trh jardin del mar. We were there for a 2 week stay and we were not disappointed. Lovely hotel with stunning views   We were self catering so cannot comment on breakfast and dinner but did have the bacon baguette and chips from snack pool bar which were awesome. Check in and check out went smoothly  all staff on reception were friendly and always willing to help. We spent a lot of time in the pool which was always clean and manned by a life guard.  No lilos or floats allowed in the pool which was good so pool didn't get overfilled with them. Every time we tried for a sun bed we got one but a lot of people leave their towel on the beds and then go away for the day but I did notice on a couple of occasion these were removed if no one was…

title: Ticks the boxes
review: Dear Anne,  We are pleased to read that you have enjoyed your stay at TRH Jardin del mar because  our goal is to offer a good service and make our customers feel satisfied. Thank you for your opinion, which helps us allways to improve.  We hope to see you next year  Best regards  TRH Jardin del mar

title: Jason Morgan
review: We, family of 4 with 2 teenage daughters, have just returned from a great 10 night stay here.  The important stuff that people actually want to know, or will find useful....  Great location first and foremost !  Wifi is not free ! It is charged at €24 per device, per 7 days ! Or, nip across for lunch at Arkles Bar, use their free Wifi, and you can then connect from sitting outside reception for the rest of your stay 😉 Every bar has free Wifi locally 👍🏼  Sun beds ! If you want a poolside sun bed, set your alarm because at 8am every morning, there is a stampede as the doors are unlocked ! However, depending on which lifeguard is on shift that day, if you don't occupy your saved sun bed by 10.30am, your towels are removed and hung on a rail at the side of the pool ! Good idea I…

title: Loved Santa Ponsa
review: Dear Guest, Thank you very much for your time and the trust that you have placed in our Hotel. We hope to see you again. Kind regards  TRH Jardin del mar

title: Excellent
review: Myself and my Family returned from the Jardin del Mar yesterday.  We arrived around 02.30am and was told even though we had booked a sea view they only had partial view till around 10 and they would change our room then.  They were good to their word and changed us to apartment  608.   The view was breath taking and made my pre dinner beer taste all the better.  They have a beautiful rocky cove 1 minute walk away which is as beautiful as anything I have seen at sunset.  We all went snorkelling there one day and found a variety of fish and even an octopus.   The pool was beautiful and cool the only complaint was it to deep for the kids to stand in.  They have fantastic restaurants within a minutes walk you have to try Los Salono and Manolos.  The staff were all friendly and…

title: THEFT FROM ROOMS!
review: Spent 10 days at this Hotel with my family. After arriving at 5.30am we were greeted by a very rude man on reception who's exacts words were'you too late, I have to switch all this on again now' as in his computer to check us on, then he proceeds to slam papers around whilst tutting as he went.  We were due at this time, so surely he should have had everything ready for us to check in???? Hotel is lovely , Greta views etc.... However, what is not good is a theft from our room!! 100 euros stolen from my 13 year old purse! Went straight to reception to be met by receptionist and manager lurking in the back room. We were told to go to the police station in magaluf to report this...WRONG police station!!  Wasted money on a taxi to magaluf (which they refunded) after my partner got…

title: Pleasantly surprised
review: We have just returned from 5 nights half board here and had a lovely time. Would definitely recommend paying a little extra for a seaview room as it was amazing, we also asked for a room on a high floor and sitting on our balcony overlooking the whole bay of Santa ponsa was fabulous.  The rooms were basic and could do with an update but they were very clean and functional and had everything we needed, we were comfortable and happy in our room despite it needing some attention in places but nothing major. I actually really liked the design of the bathroom with a walk in shower. The staff were helpful and friendly and the hotel communal areas were clean. It's in a good location just a 10 minute walk from the main beach and all the restaurants and bars. The sunbeds did get reserved…

title: Brilliant Stay!
review: Stayed here with my wife and kids (17 and 13) for a week 10th -17th August, absolutely brilliant and couldn't have asked for more.  Forget the reviews about rude staff and bad food, totally not the case.  All staff were pleasant and polite, the room was basic but clean and comfortable and a great view of the Bay.  No Problem getting a sun lounger when we wanted them, food brilliant and plenty choice.  Well recommend staying here.

title: Not good
review: We knew it would be basic but..... Arrived to be told they did not have the apartment we booked but they had a substandard room or we could go to another hotel for one night. We were only going for 4 nights. We insisted on being offered 2 rooms as we had paid for a 1 bed apartment. They refused. Any sort of compensation was refused. Any apology or sympathy was completely absent. Then the reception man started lying to us about what we had nooked and what we were entitled to. I then called expefia who called him and wow, a 1 bed apartment with sea view was given to us immediatly. He almost threw the key at us and gave us the most filthy looks. No apology, no manager apology. Nothing.  Tiny Pool, not enough space for amount of guests. Sunbeds all reserved by 8am. Did not eat here.…

title: Perfect as a base for 2 weeks
review: Small rooms, cleaned regularly with adequate self catering facilities. Very cold fridge with freezer compartment and air con that took the edge of the heat. Fantastic shower. Rooms need a bit of an update. We pretty much were only in the room to sleep so some of the issues mentioned in other reviews didn't affect us.  Perfect location with supermarkets and restaurants on your door step. Absolutely amazing views and only a 10 min walk from the main beach in Santa Ponsa which was ideal.  Sun beds are an issue and to see people queueing and then running to get their spot was a sight to behold! Didn't affect us we went to the beach everyday.  Daily kids entertainment programme which is a bonus if that's what you're after.  Helpful reception staff, shower facilities and clean towels…

title: Stunning views
review: Seaview premium room basic but massive balcony stunning views of the bay with loads of boating activity. Standard room with pool view would also be lovely but smaller balcony. Lovely bay for snorkelling on doorstep.

title: Good but let down
review: Stayed here for two weeks in August , Overbooked so first night  put in the wrong room (studio) booked One bed. Given an upgraded room to make up. Heatwave during our stay air con just about adequate . Had two power cut so couldn't cook or worse wash on TWO serarate evenings. Food in fridge had to be binned and got no explaination from management. Given nothing to make up for this . Nice hotel nice staff but badly let down by management

title: Do not book this hotel - Please read
review: Prior to booking this hotel, my friends and I read the reviews on Trip Advisor and noted that several people had suggested requesting a room above the 4th floor due to break ins. Despite this, we proceeded with the booking. The room we were initially given was on the 6th Floor, however we asked to move to a larger room given there were 3 of us. The new room was on the 5th Floor.  On the second day of our holiday, having returned to the room from the pool, a pair of trousers that had been left in our first room were on the table with a note from a member of staff. We then realised that an I Pad Pro, 2 x I phones, over £1,500 in euros and pounds, designer sunglasses and a passport had been stolen, with no sign of forced entry. We alerted reception immediately and after making two…

title: First Family Holiday Abroad
review: Myself, husband and 5 year old son stayed at the hotel from 28th July for 10 nights.   On arrival we were very impressed with the hotel. The lady behind the desk advised us that our room wasnt ready and that check in was 3pm but to come back about 2ish and we would be able to get in to our room. She gave us keys to the luggage room and we dug out our swimwear and got changed.   We returned to the hotel and were given our keys. We were staying in Room 412 which is on same floor as reception and then the first door on your right so was very handy.   On arrival to the room it was very basic but that is what we were expecting. Had a lovely view of the pool and sea. The air con in our room was good. When we were there it was a heatwave but never had an issue sleeping at nighttime.  …

title: Family Holiday
review: Excellent location for families and couples, no noise at night time, Pool area and rooms very clean. Cleaner came every day of our 10 day stay, very happy jolly girl nothing was a problem for her. As i had two 20yr olds with me we did not have the room cleaned every day as the two were in bed but was given fresh towels etc by the cleaner and anything else we needed. Reception staff were excellent, polite and helpful.The sun bed scenario leaves alot to be desired but I cannot see any way around this, up at 8ish to put towels on beds.The policy is if beds are not occupied by 10.30 am towels will be removed but this did not happen most days. I witnessed one young Mum who had towels on beds and left to go up to change her baby but unfortunately at the wrong time, just after 10.30 so…

title: Needs better Air Con
review: We have just returned from a 7 night stay at the TRH Jardin. I am the type of person who is easily pleased with holidays abroad and always take negative reviews with a pinch of salt.   We had 2 rooms and we paid for Superior Sea View as we wanted a little extra luxury for our holiday. The rooms looked lovely; 120 & 320. Big balconies overlooking the cove and sea. Small kitchen area and small living room. Me and hubbie slept in the bedroom - 2 single beds pushed together, and the 2 kids slept on the sofa and pull out bed. No complaints there. The beds were hard, but I don't expect a comfy bed when I go abroad anyway. The rooms were cleaned every day and towels and sheets changed, although I did see signs saying this wouldn't happen every day.  When we arrived, there was a…

title: Great holiday!
review: The hotel is very clean and in a great location. Air conditioning is very poor and is a bit of a deal breaker in terms of returning during peak summer heat. We hired a fan from reception which was a life saver. Rooms are dates but tick all of the boxes. The little kitchenette was a great addition to our holiday. View from balcony was great. Well worth paying extra for sea view. We had a 7th floor room which I would recommend.   Staff are very polite and helpful.  Hotel location is fabulous. Next to shops and restaurants. Pool bar is great too. Reasonably priced and beautiful views.   Pool is great and very clean. Queue for sunbeds in the morning but lifeguard removed towels at 10:30am if people had not returned. Thought this was a great move by hotel staff!   I would have five…

title: TRH Jardin del mar santa ponsa
review: We stayed at the jardin del mar with our 2 children aged 11 & 4. We really enjoyed our stay. The hotel is in a lovely location only minutes from the beach with a small cove even closer than that. The rooms were quite basic but always clean & had a kettle which was all we needed as we were half board. The food was the only negative of our stay. We don't expect Michelin starred food but it was very bland and some days it was a struggle to pick something. The kids were ok with breakfasts - cereal, toast full English  etc but on the whole it wasn't great. The pool was really nice and was quite warm but no lilos were allowed which was unusual and there was no defined shallow end or deep end.The staff were friendly and worked really hard but sometimes there didn't seem enough of them.…

title: Hotel side seaview..
review: This was my side sea view position at the hotel....we asked to be moved as we arrived on the 1st night....the hotel refused to move us....be very careful when booking.this view ruined our holiday.we had asked for a sea view.

title: Never again
review: My family of 3 stayed in this hotel I visited thank god They were on 3rd floor where do I start the room was filthy cuboard doors hanging off the kitchen I wouldn't even use the shutters to the kitchen had an inch of dust on the kettle could not be plugged in as socket was half way up the wall so had to use in  bedroom the bath was yellow and had cockcroaches towels and bedding changed x2 in 10 days room was dark and very very dated aircon never worked Reception so rude made you feel you were an inconvenience  my family slept there and that was it they stayed at my hotel VERDERMAR OUTSTANDING All in all horrible rooms and reception staff never again

title: Jardin del mar
review: Staff on reception very rude and unhelpful.  Charged us for a safe on arrival even though there was one in the room that they didn't tell us about. Won't ever stay here again that's for sure.  Rooms were okay but in need of maintenance.  Also beach is a good 15 minutes away walk. We had to go to the beach most days unless you got up before 8am to put your towel on a bed. This is what everyone does but then they go out for the day which isn't fair as the beds aren't utilised.

title: Appalling
review: I don't really know where to start with this hotel. We go to Majorca every year usually to Pollensa but fancied a change- never again !! On arrival reception staff treated us as an inconvenience and more or less threw the keys at us. The room was clean but very small and dated. The view was lovely from our balcony.  We stayed half board - food was bland and boring and as a veggie I lived on cheese for the week as no vegetarian option at dinner.We decided to make the most of it as the weather was lovely but unfortunately the attitude of the staff completely ruined our holiday. After ordering drinks the waiter brought the wrong ones over when my husband pointed this out we were grunted and tutted at and the looks we got were just awful. There was no customer care and we were…

title: Jardin Del mar
review: Stayed here for a week with my daughter not the best place. Pool is either a baby pool or 1 that I even had to stand on my tip toes in would not recommend for kids. Rooms are a bit small and out of date my view was trees. We had a load of young Irish kids I would say around us age between 16 - 18 drinking all the time and the noise was terrible they where up all night every night and no one ever seemed to do anything about it. The sun loungers situation is shocking go down at 9am not a bed left only opens at 8 towels on them all and most people don't appear to well after lunch time for them. The bath towels are like hand towels I'm not a tall person but they hardly covered my bum.

title: 5 days stay
review: Stayed on the 4th floor which is the the same floor as the reception, on the first night we came back to the hotel after a night out to find our door wide open - being very panicked we went straight to reception to meet a very apologetic receptionist. He told us he had given someone else our key by accident.. The girl who was given our key went to our room and noticed it wasn't hers and left straight away, leaving the door wide open. We were informed she was under the influence which in my opinion makes the situation so much worse. Thankfully nothing was touched. Massive error by the hotel staff. Room was small but convenient. Air condition was awful. Location was the best part of the hotel as it was a ten minute walk from the Santa Ponsa strip, the pool was also nice. One…

title: Family hol
review: Stayed on 1st floor & had a really nice view from the apartment, their were 12 on my party & we all enjoyed the holiday, rooms very clean but quite dated, can't fault the location with The Square only a 2 minute walk away, the little bay is really nice, all staff very helpful & friendly we would definitely stay again.

title: 10 days stay
review: Good hotel great facilities it was my second time there the only problem I had was I requested a disabled room for my father but we never got one and the air conditioning in one of the rooms wasn't great.

title: Very Average Hotel
review: After reading mixed reviews on trip advisor I was a bit concerned about my stay at the hotel. We booked 10 nights half board in July.   First of all the hotel is clean and the views from our room were stunning. Staff were friendly. That's about the only positives I can say.  The air conditioning is shocking. One of the reasons I picked this hotel was because it had air conditioning. The air con only comes on when you are in the room. In 38 degree heat and being pregnant this is not good...it was so bad we ended up asking reception if we could get a fan. Fortunately reception gave us a spare key so we could have it on all the time which helped slightly but still wasn't great.  The rooms are very small and for a family of 4 it was very cramped. The beds are rock hard and not…

title: Break away with friends
review: We travelled as a group of ladies between the ages of 33 and 50 for a long weekend. The hotel is very family orientated with a nice pool, although quite deep. The people behind the snack bar were nice and the food was tasty and reasonably priced.   Rooms were dated but clean and comfortable. We had a sea view which is definitely worth paying extra for.   Sun bed situation is a nightmare, but you can find one by the afternoon. Once they opened the pool people were actually running to get the beds that the wanted. If was quite funny watching them from our balcony.    There is a small rocky beach near the hotel or the main beach is about a 15min walk.   We didn't go to any of the entertainment at the hotel, but there is lots to do in Santa Ponsa. I would recommend going to the…

title: Great family holiday
review: We've stayed at the hotel before and there was no entertainment for children so we spent every night at the square just minutes from the hotel however this year the children preferred to stay at the hotel and loved the kids mini disco at night by nadia and santo.

title: Beautiful location
review: Travelled with 5 friends all female and we shared two apartments.Apartments are quiet small and basic but very clean with fabulous views over the bay.Great location only ten minutes walk to main beach area and plenty of bars and restaurants across the road from the hotel.I found all staff on reception to be very helpful and friendly. We didn't use the restaurant in the hotel so cannot comment on this.The snack bar at the pool was adequate if a little slow as very busy at times.The only real problem we had was the pool area is far too small for the amount of hotel guests so not enough sun beds etc. and the usual issue with selfish guests reserving beds from 8 am and leaving the beds empty for hours.This should be addressed by the hotel.Overall a good stay and great family hotel.

title: TRH JARDIN DEL MAR
review: we have stayed at this hotel for the last 3 years and we have never been disappointed. It is well situated in Santa Ponsa. We have always found the service and staff excellent. This was our first to with Jet2 and I cannot praise them enough everything was so well organised.

title: Good hotel if they get it right!
review: I have stayed in Santa Ponsa many times over the years and chose this hotel based on reviews for a 4 day stay with my daughter to relax before her graduation later that week. On arrival at 11.30pm we were allocated room 30 on the ground floor (the entrance and reception is on level 4). When we entered the room the smell of stale smoke was overwhelming, the room was dark and dismal and when I went out through the patio doors we were looking at a concrete wall and being on the ground level i looked over and noted a lot of chunks of bread and pieces of food, I think this would definitely be a big attraction for vermin. Before I go on and you think I'm picky or fussy, can I just advise that I have travelled all over the world (including India) and have never once asked to be moved…

title: GREAT HOLIDAY AGAIN HERE, IGNORE THE MOANERS
review: Dear Jill,  Our apologize for the bad start of your holiday, we regret that you felt disapointed, but we are happy to read that finally you were better with the change to a new apartment. Your opinion help us to improve our services, thank you for sharing it with us.  Congratulations for your daughter graduation.  Best regards  Quality manager TRH Jardin del mar

title: Poor
